The Vattenfall Group has approximately 20,000 employees. We have been electrifying industries, powering homes and transforming life through innovation for more than 100 years. We now want to make fossil free living possible within one generation and we are driving the transition to a sustainable energy system.

title: Identity Access Management Consultant
description:
*Want to join Avanade’s Nordic Security Practice?* 
 We are expanding out team and looking for a new team member to work as an
 **Identity and Access Management Consultant** 
 with international clients.
   

  

**Come join us**
 This is a client-facing consulting role, where you will work on exciting projects that transform our client’s solutions with a focus on Microsoft Digital Identity capabilities as well as other leading market vendors (e.g. Saviynt & One Identity). As a member of our security practice, you will work for both Avanade and Accenture clients, ranging from medium to large global enterprises.
   

  

**Skills And Experiences**
* Microsoft Ecosystem knowledge with a focus on digital identity
* You have worked with or have knowledge from the Microsoft IAM subjects such as: MS Entra ID and External identities, Active Directory Domain Services (hardening and attributes mapping in a hybrid scenarios), Azure AD External Identities and B2B custom configurations, Privileged Access Management (PIM/PAM), Conditional Access & Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), Single Sign-On (SSO), Enterprise Application and App registrations, Microsoft Graph, Identity Governance
* Knowledge to execute Security Assessments on MS Active Directory for our clients to detect and remediate weaknesses
* Experience setting up the lifecycle management processes, creating and managing accounts in different systems, with their corresponding rights, MFA settings, and Conditional Access policies
* Understanding of Active Directory and legacy authentication protections (e.g. LDAP, Kerberos, NTLM)
* Able to prepare well written and concise material in English
* Can identify new or extend current opportunities at the account level and contribute to the overall selling process


 We see Security and M365 Copilot background architecture understanding as a benefit, but this is not mandatory to possess already in the beginning. We at Avanade focus on trainings and development where you will be supported with your learning path in becoming an experienced Microsoft Security professional. All relevant MS certifications such as AZ-500, SC-300, SC-900 or other security certifications such as SSCP, CCSP, or CompTIA Security+ are valuable.
   

  

**About You**
 Characteristics that can spell success for this role:
   

  

* Ability to collaborate within a large global organization
* Have gained experience from consulting and advisory discussions with clients and other consulting firms
* Have a passion for Microsoft Security solutions and the ambition to deepen your knowledge and develop yourself in this area in the coming years


 For this role, we require fluency in both English and Swedish.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
 As an IAM Consultant, you will advise our clients in the field of digital identities to protect their access to information, applications, infrastructure, and business processes. You will work closely with the various stakeholders from the customer and colleagues from Avanade, Accenture, and Microsoft. The clients you will be working for are enterprise organizations in various industries. You will give them advice using your experience and knowledge in the field of IAM. In addition, you, together with a team of colleagues, will supervise the implementation of technical IAM solutions for our clients.
   

  

 Many companies want to work towards the Zero-Trust principle, and you will advise your clients about this. Because it has become apparent that passwords cannot protect identity optimally, many companies are now switching to Single Sign-on in combination with Passwordless Authentication. We help our clients by advising them and making this transition a reality.
   

  

**Learn more**
 To learn more about the types of projects our Security team works on check out this info:
   

  

* Avanade Security - Are you Doing Enough?
* EDF Client Story | Avanade
* Zurich Client Story | Avanade
* A Catastrophic Cyber Event. Are You Ready?
* The New World of Decentralized Identity


  

  

 Interested in knowing what’s going on inside Avanade? Check out our blogs:
   

  

* Avanade Insights – exchange ideas that drive tomorrow’s innovation
* Inside Avanade – explore what life is like working at Avanade


**Enjoy your career**
 Some of the best things about working at Avanade
   

  

* Opportunity to work for Microsoft’s Global Alliance Partner of the Year (14 years in a row), with exceptional development and training (minimum 80 hours per year for training and paid certifications)
* Real-time access to technical and skilled resources globally
* Dedicated career advisor to encourage your growth
* Engaged and helpful coworkers genuinely interested in you


  

  

 Find out more about some of our benefits Employee Benefits at Avanade | Avanade
   

  

  

  

**A great place to work**
 As you bring your skills and abilities to Avanade, you’ll get distinctive experiences, limitless learning, and ambitious growth in return. As we continue to build our diverse and inclusive culture, we become even more innovative and creative, helping us better serve our clients and communities. You’ll join a community of smart, supportive collaborators to lift, mentor, and guide you, and to lean on your expertise. You get a company purpose-built for business-critical, leading-edge technology solutions, committed to improving the way humans work, interact, and live. It’s all here, so take a closer look!
   

  

 We work hard to provide an inclusive, diverse culture with a deep sense of belonging for all our employees. Visit our Inclusion & Diversity page.
   

  

  

  

 Create a future for our people that focuses on
   

  

* Expanding your thinking
* Experimenting courageously
* Learning and pivoting


  

  

 Inspire greatness in our people by
   

  

* Empowering every voice
* Encouraging boldness
* Celebrating progress


  

  

 Accelerate the impact of our people by
   

  

* Amazing the client
* Prioritizing what matters
* Acting as one

title: Product Development/Innovation Manager - AI for public sector (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
**Product Development/Innovation Manager - AI for public sector (m/f/d)**
 Do you have a passion for developing valuable innovation for people?
   

  

 Do you want to find out how new technologies like AI can create a better workday for public service employees? Do you want to be part of a dynamic and diverse team of experts who are transforming the way digital government services are delivered? If yes, then you might be interested in this opportunity!
   

  

 Tietoevry Public 360 is offering essential services to hundreds of public institutions across the Nordics, helping them to provide better and faster services to citizens and businesses while improving their internal efficiency. Document and case management is the core of public administration, and our Vision is to enhance the work life of public servants and the daily lives of citizens.
   

  

 Our team is providing integrated AI capabilities as part of standard software solutions that support thousands of users every day.
   

  

**The role**
 We are now searching for a
 **Product Development/Innovation Manager (PDM)** 
 as part of our AI innovation team. This role is central to facilitate close customer and market relationships in combination of domain in order to drive valuable process and concept innovation.
   

  

 Together with the Product Manager you will work on the product roadmap, describing and prioritizing epics and user stories. As PDM you are coordinating the implementation, test and rollout of functionality with the development team and our data scientists. Experience with agile methodologies like scrum and a software development environment will enable you to contribute to further improve our planning and development processes.
   

  

**Your main responsibilities include:**
* Facilitate customer and market contact to describe and structure user requirements to address significant customer problems.
* Contribute to domain concept development, establishing our position as thought leader in our sector.
* Contribute to the concept development for new products and features
* Organize coordination of requirements with development, design, and data science team
* Support the product manager in priorities for development to establish a customer value driven roadmap.
* Interact with other product teams and services for internal maturity building and supporting in-sale and implementation projects
* Contributing to the AI governance and ethics dialogues for new AI-driven capabilities


**To succeed in your role we expect you to have:**
* A hands-on, solution-focused start-up mentality to drive responsible innovation for the good of customers and the public.
* Strong customer orientation and business acumen, very good communication and collaboration skills and ability to work independently and proactively.
* Having solid understanding and ideally practical experience from working in public administration either in local or central government or other public agencies.
* Domain understanding from public sector
* Interest and ideally practical work experience from either municipality or central government sector
* Innovation and product management
* Experience with product management tasks and practices for gathering, describing, and organizing requirements towards development. Ideally combined with experience in innovation management and concept development Ideally from Norwegian, Nordic public sector
* Passion to continuously learn new things and aim higher and curiosity in new technologies and concepts, like AI and analytic
* You do not need to be an expert on AI, but you should be interested on technology innovation and how it can impact business processes, working live and society.
* Preferably you have experience working in technical roles in complex product development and/or other SW development projects.
* Good Nordic and English language skills.


**We offer**
 We offer you the chance to make a difference and be part of the forefront of emerging businesses and technology, in an innovative and entrepreneurial environment, with a start-up way of working. You have a chance to cooperate with colleagues in an international and evolving working environment and increase your knowledge in a variety of areas from R&D to creating new business models and services.
   

  

 We offer you a challenging position with great opportunities for professional growth. With us, you will have the opportunity to directly influence your career development. If you have a good idea, people will listen to you. We believe that trust fosters freedom and creativity. Our culture is built on transparency and active sharing – a truly open environment.
   

  

**Interested?** 
 We look forward to receiving your application and the opportunity to meet you! Tietoevry values diversity and encourages everyone to apply.

title: Principal Tech Bus Dev, Industry Products
description:
**Description**
 The AWS Industry Products (AIP) is chartered to build solutions that solve some of the biggest manufacturing technology challenges by partnering and co-developing with segment leading companies. Our team directly collaborates with strategic customers to build new, industry-specific products that directly impact and transform industries at AWS scale. We are a team of innovators that tackle difficult problems, and build products through fast iteration in a start-up like environment.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 The Principal Business Development and Alliance Manager (Pr BDM) will work with AWS Industry Products leadership, customers, solution architects, product engineering teams, and sales account teams to design, develop, and deliver transformative customer strategic co-development products and alliances. These strategic alliances are complex, long-term engagements and represent significant investment from both AWS and our customers. We are seeking a Principal Business Development Manager to lead business outcomes, drive program delivery, ensure product-industry fit, foster productive customer relationship, and potentially serve as overall alliance lead in an upcoming co-development. Ensuring a positive, productive business relationship is key to long-term, sustainable investment ROI and requires a dedicated business resource to identify, curate, secure, and support the co-development.
   

  

 The ideal candidate will have launched and incubated the market and business development of industry software and services, understand cloud computing services, be a self-starter, be capable of long term strategic vision and short term action, and be willing operate both tactically and strategically. As a key team member in this fast growing, exciting space you will have the opportunity to help lead the early market development efforts for new offerings, to establish wins with lighthouse customers and, as the business grows, to identify new customer opportunities and drive the creation of detailed new channel investment plans that can capture these opportunities and shape the future of our category. This role requires industry and solution experience, partner, product, and business development skills. In order to be successful with multi-year business engagements, this person will be focused on co-development opportunities to ensure consistency and focus on the GTM objectives set forth in the initial investment case.
   

  

 The candidate should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically and analytically about long term durable business trends, product design, and technical execution challenges, with the ability to build and convey compelling value propositions, and work cross-organizationally to build actionable plans and alignment. A track record of helping establish new business via focused incubation mechanisms and then broad partnerships will be important for this role.
   

  

**About The Team**
 About AWS
   

  

 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 AWS values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship & Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
 Extensive experience developing, negotiating and executing business agreements
   

  

 Extensive experience developing strategies that influence leadership decisions at the organizational level
   

  

 Proven GTM and business development experience with industry software and services with a focus on cloud computing services
   

  

**Preferred Qualifications**
 Experience as a founder or executive focused on related segments, or as a practice leader or business unit owner
   

  

 Experience selling to Fortune 1000 or Global 2000 organizations
   

  

 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch) - G54
   

  

 Job ID: A2677563

title: Marketing Operations Manager
description:
*You know that corporate document or piece of research you know you have somewhere but you can’t seem to find it?* 
 🤯
 *The struggle to gather, organize and visualize all corporate knowledge and insights is real.*
 We are Stravito and this is the problem we solve.
   

  

 Due to the universal nature of this problem, our customers come from various industries all around the world. We help world-leading organizations, such as McDonald’s, Nestlé, Burberry and Heineken, get closer to their customers and make better, insights-backed decisions by organizing their knowledge and making it easy to access through our intuitive platform.
   

  

 We really mean it when we say we're a diverse and international team as our team of 90 has more than 30 different nationalities! We are guided by our operating principles: simplicity first, an “own it, do it” mentality, embracing different perspectives, and enjoying the journey together.
   

  

**About The Job**
 We are seeking an experienced and hands-on Marketing Operations Manager to join our dynamic Revenue Operations team. The Marketing Operations Manager will play a crucial role in optimizing and streamlining our technology, database and processes to drive efficiency, effectiveness, and overall commercial success. This role will be responsible for managing Sales/Marketing technology, database accuracy/cleanliness, and supporting cross-functional collaboration between the commercial teams.
   

  

**Responsibilities** 
  

  

* Technology Management
+ Oversee and manage our Marketing automation/CRM system (HubSpot) and other Sales/Marketing technology (e.g., Livestorm) to ensure efficient operation.
+ Evaluate, select, and implement new technologies as needed.
+ Troubleshoot technical issues and collaborate with vendors to resolve them.

* Data Management
+ Manage commercial data, including cleansing, enrichment and validation.
+ Implement best practices for data governance, ensuring data accuracy and compliance with relevant regulations.
+ Develop and maintain multi-touch attribution mechanisms and models that track the impact of Marketing efforts on revenue generation.

* Marketing Automation
+ Lead marketing automation efforts, including campaign setup, lead scoring, nurturing, and personalization to drive engagement and conversion.
+ Collaborate with commercial teams to execute campaigns and initiatives effectively.
+ Ensure the alignment of technology, data, and processes to support campaign goals.

* Process Improvement
+ Identify opportunities for process improvement between the Marketing/Sales/Business Development teams and implement streamlined workflows.
+ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment and efficiency in commercial processes.


**About You**
* 3-5 years experience in Revenue/Marketing operations, technology, and data management in a B2B SaaS environment.
* 2-3 years experience as a HubSpot admin (both Marketing and CRM) is a must. Experience with ABM platforms (e.g., 6sense, Demandbase) is a plus.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent project management and organizational abilities.
* Understanding of data privacy and compliance regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA).
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team.


 What's in it for you?
   

  

 You will join a remote and globally spread team, with company events a couple of times each year as the extra cheese on your delicious pizza 🍕 We offer a fun, collaborative environment where everyone truly cares and helps each other. We have zero micro-management and instead you are encouraged to cultivate your own processes while giving and receiving feedback for improvement. Add to that a competitive compensation package, the possibility of working with cutting-edge technology in our industry (such as GenAI) and to be part of simplifying the professional lives of many - what’s not to like?
   

  

 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Vi söker en SLÖJDLÄRARE, trä & metall slöjd på 60-80%
description:
Nackas kommunala skolor når goda resultat och genom beprövad samt ny pedagogik bejakar vi kreativitet för att stimulera barns och ungdomars lärande. Vi har ett aktivt utbyte mellan våra 2 600 medarbetare som arbetar inom förskola, grundskola och gymnasium.
   

  

 Orminge skola - en mötesplats för lärande med framtidstro. Skolan ligger centralt nära shopping och kultur utan att sakna natursköna och lugna omgivningar med närhet till skog och vatten. Goda kommunikationer tar dig från Slussen på ca 20 minuter. Orminge skola är en mångkulturell F-6 skola med nio arbetslag. Skolan samarbetar med Nacka musikskola och många av eleverna åk 1-3 spelar fiol eller cello. Skolan arbetar med entreprenöriellt lärande. Vår fina motorikpark, Happy Park, är ett konkret resultat av ett entreprenöriellt utvecklingsarbete. Skolan har en god IT-miljö med många kompetenta pedagoger som tillsammans med eleverna utvecklar lärandet. Skolgården är unik och vacker och främjar alla elevers motorik, rörelse och trivsel.
   

  

 Vill Du arbeta i en fantastiskt fin trä & metallslöjdsal med härliga och kreativa elever så ska du söka tjänsten som slöjdlärare på Orminge skola.
   

  

**Ditt uppdrag**
 Du kommer att undervisa i trä & metallslöjd för elever i årskurs 3-6 samt med elever i årskurs 3-9 från Myrsjö resursskola som vi delar lokaler med.
   

  

**Din erfarenhet**
 För denna tjänst bör du ha lärarlegitimation i slöjd. Vi ser gärna att du tidigare har undervisat i ämnet och har gedigna kunskaper om läroplan och kursplan.
   

  

**Är det är du?**
 Du är en positiv och engagerad lärare med pedagogiska grundkunskaper. Vi vill att du är en person som har lätt för att samarbeta men samtidigt kan arbeta självständigt. Du behöver vara flexibel och kunna se på ditt arbete utifrån en helhetssyn. I slöjdsalen utförs skolarbete med verktyg och maskiner som vid ett felaktigt användande kan vara farliga så du behöver dessutom vara strukturerad och ordningsam.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
 Vi erbjuder en välplanerad skola i ett mångkulturellt område. Lärarna på skolan är välkomnande och samarbetsvilliga, du kommer ha textilslöjdsläraren som din närmsta kollega. Slöjdsalen är välordnad och erbjuder en fin arbetsmiljö. Vi har väldigt god skolmat som du endast betalar 300 kr/månad för och då ingår kaffe eller thé under hela arbetsdagen.
   

  

 Som anställd i Nacka kommun har du bland annat tillgång till förmåner som friskvårdsbidrag på 3 000 kr per år, köp av SL-kort via nettolöneavdrag och en mångsidig intern stödfunktion. I Nacka får du möjlighet att arbeta i en kommun som vill vara bäst i Sverige på att vara kommun, och som har öppenhet och mångfald som sin vision och en grundläggande värdering att lita på människors kunskap, vilja och förmåga.
   

  

**Intresserad?**
 Om du vill bli en del av Nacka kommun, tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan! Vill du veta mer om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta biträdande rektor Katja Lager på 070 4318161 eller via mejl katja.lager@nacka.se.
   

  

 Urval och intervjuer kan komma att ske löpande under ansökningstiden. Sista ansökningsdag 20240819. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via vårt rekryteringssystem. Vi ser fram emot att få din ansökan!
   

  

**Utdrag ur Polisens belastningsregister för skola och förskola krävs** 
 i samband med anställning. Vi ber dig att välja "digitalt registerutdrag" för snabbare hantering. Länk här.
   

  

 Bakgrundskontroll kan komma att tillämpas.
   

  

 Tjänsten tillsätts under förutsättning att den inte behöver tas i anspråk för intern omplacering.
   

  

 Besök gärna Nackas kommunala skolor och förskolors karriärsida här
   

  

 Nacka är en av Sveriges mest attraktiva och välrenommerade kommuner. Med fokus på mål, resultat, hållbart medarbetarengagemang och ständig utveckling strävar Nacka efter att bli bäst på att vara kommun. Nacka kommun är arbetsgivaren för dig som med stor frihet förnyar och gör skillnad.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: deltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 60-80% | Ort: Nacka | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/389 | Kontakt: Katja Lager +4687189261, | Facklig företrädare: Sveriges lärare, Mikael Eriksson mikael.eriksson@nacka.se, | Publicerat: 2024-07-18 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-08-19

title: Senior Analytics & Performance Management Manager
description:
Do you have a passion for transforming businesses and making them data-driven companies? Are you looking for a place where you could combine your business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how? Do you know how to bring value out of data?
   

  

 If Yes, bring your talent and passion to Accenture and help us deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Take this opportunity to develop your skills and build an extraordinary career! You will play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world. Let there be change!
   

  

**About Our Nordic SAP Business Group**
 As the leading Nordic SAP transformation partner, we work with end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major transformation programs.
   

  

 Within our Nordic community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4, SAP BTP, Datasphere, SAP Analytics Cloud, HANA, BW/4, and SAP RISE.
   

  

 We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking at candidates for several positions and seniority levels.
   

  

 To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
   

  

**What’s in it for you:**
- Work with some of the largest enterprises in the Nordics and support them in their global transformation journeys

- Be a valuable member of our Nordic SAP Analytics group and contribute to thought leadership, competence development and sales initiatives.

- Significant development opportunities and support for progressing in your professional career; functional, technical and as a leader.

- A dedicated mentor to guide you during your work with continuous feedback.

- Being part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment.

- Competitive compensation and benefits.

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert networks and benchmarks.

**As a senior Analytics professional in Accenture, you will:**
- Advise clients about best solutions in regards to Analytics and Data depending on their current situation and unique characteristics

- Lead a team that works closely together with clients to help them get real value out of their data by embedding analytics into their business processes.

- Advice and deliver analytics implementations based on S/4 Analytics extensibility, data warehouse solutions like Datasphere and BW/4HANA, hybrid scenarios leveraging data lake/lakehouse solutions, planning and frontend development in solutions like SAP Analytics Cloud.

- Be able to grow your professional skills within analytics, big data and AI.

- Help clients’ sustainability agenda through cutting-edge analytics.

- Work on selling Analytics projects to clients through RFP processes as well as part of daily work together with our clients.

**Required Qualifications**
- Extensive experience in defining and implementing analytics and planning solutions

- Deep functional knowledge within at least one area of Finance, Sales, Manufacturing or Logistics

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility, and team player

- Passionate about innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English and a Nordic language

- Experience working with sales of Analytics solutions

- M.Sc. or B.Sc. in Business or Engineering, such as Computer Science or Mathematics/Statistics

- Hands-on experience with SAP Analytics technologies such as S/4 Analytics Extensibility, SAP Analytics Cloud (reporting & planning), Datasphere, BW/4 or HANA.

**Preferred Qualifications**
- Experience with data lake/lakehouse solutions

- Experience with enhancing Analytical solutions through AI

**Location**
 Stockholm
   

  

 Pleasenote that due to the summer season, our hiring process may be slower than usual. We apologize for any delay in responding to your applications. Rest assured, we are committed to reviewing each application thoroughly. We appreciate your patience during this time.

title: SAP Sourcing & Procurement consultant
description:
Do you have a passion for transforming businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies? Are you looking for a place where you could combine your business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how? Then our roles as SAP Sourcing & Procurement consultant in our SAP Business Group are a perfect find for you! Bring your talent and passion to Accenture and help us deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity. Take this opportunity to develop your skills and build an extraordinary career. You will play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world. Let there be change!
 **About Our Nordic SAP Business Group** 
 Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As the leading Nordic and Global SAP transformation partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major SAP S/4 HANA driven business transformation programs with several of the biggest companies. Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, Ariba, Icertis, SAP BTP and SAP RISE. Our proven delivery methods inclde preconfigured industry template and embrace new capabilities introduced by AI . We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking at experienced candidates for several positions and seniority levels. To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
 **What’s in it for you:**
- Work with some of the biggest SAP clients in large global implementation projects.

- Be an integral part of innovative SAP transformation projects.

- Significant development opportunities and support for progressing in your professional career.

- Rich opportunities to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills.

- Access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert network and benchmarks.

- A dedicated mentor to guide you during your work with continuous feedback.

- Being part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment.

- Utilize your functional and technical expertise in SAP, by analyzing, designing, and implementing business processes supported by SAP best practice solutions.

- Utilize your Industry expertise in the field of SAP solutions to deliver client value as a professional individual and as part of a team.

- Take part in our highly engaged and diverse global network, for collaboration and delivery.

- Competitive compensation and benefits.

- Help clients’ sustainability agenda through SAP transformations.

- Be a valuable member of our Nordic SAP Smart Procurement Value Tower and contribute to thought leadership, competence development, and sales initiatives. SAP Smart Procurement Nordic Value Tower The sourcing & procurement function is shifting. Traditionally driven and managed by deep and complex processes, their future must become digital, data driven and automated. Helping our clients to succeed in this transformation journey is what we thrive for. SAP Smart Procurement Value Tower is one out of 10 different process specialization communities within our Nordic SAP Business Group. We work hand in hand with our procurement strategy colleagues and our global delivery centers. Our cross-Nordics team designs and configure sourcing & procurement processes in S/4 HANA, Ariba upstream and downstream processes and Fieldglass - and we excel both in large, global S/4 HANA engagements (from smart brownfield through full business transformations) as well as in more focused multi-step process capability deployments.

**Required Qualifications**
- Min. 3 years of hands-on SAP S/4 HANA sourcing & procurement experience as consultant from at least two S/4HANA projects (preferably in the Nordics)

- Based in Nordics or EU, with either EU citizenship or valid work permit

- Good understanding of sourcing and procurement business processes and their key value drivers

- Eagerness to shape and work in a team-oriented environment

- Motivated, persistent, eager to optimize, drive for excellence

- Passionate about SAP, innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Effectively work with cross-functional teams/stakeholders in an international and fast-moving environment

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility, and team player

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English

- Strong will to pursue a problem, identify the source, and propose possible solutions in collaboration with other team members in a timely manner

- A Bachelor or Master’s degree

- We recruit at different levels. For manager level and above, we would like you to have:

- at least 7 years of relevant project experience as well as

- having led a team

- demonstrating leadership skills, and ideally also

- some earlier involvement in the acquisition of new projects (business development).

**Preferred Qualifications**
- Experience of the full S/4 project lifecycle including estimating, planning, and delivering a solution end-to-end

- Nordic (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish or Finnish) language spoken

- An SAP certification in relevant area

- Ariba experience in addition to S/4 HANA configuration

- Deep business & industry experience in one or more industries

**Location** 
 Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö
   

  

**Does this appeal to you?**
 If so, we really wish to hear from you! (We need people who can challenge conventional wisdom, offer unique perspectives, and contribute with innovative solutions.)
   

  

*If you are interested to learn more about Accenture´s recruitment process, great! We have gathered more info for you* 
*here.*
 Pleasenote that due to the summer season, our hiring process may be slower than usual. We apologize for any delay in responding to your applications. Rest assured, we are committed to reviewing each application thoroughly. We appreciate your patience during this time.

title: Senior SAP Data Consultant
description:
Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. With our thought leadership and culture of innovation, we apply industry expertise, diverse skill sets and next-generation technology to each business challenge.
   

  

 We believe in inclusion and diversity and supporting the whole person. Our core values comprise of Stewardship, Best People, Client Value Creation, One Global Network, Respect for the Individual and Integrity. Year after year, Accenture is recognized worldwide not just for business performance but for inclusion and diversity too.
   

  

 “Across the globe, one thing is universally true of the people of Accenture: We care deeply about what we do and the impact we have with our clients and with the communities in which we work and live. It is personal to all of us.” –
 **Julie Sweet, Accenture CEO.**
**About our Nordic SAP Business Group:**
 Accenture and SAP have a longstanding relationship that extends more than 40 years. As the leading Nordic SAP transformation partner, we work with SAP end-to-end from product innovation to development and delivery. Together, we are revolutionizing the future of business through major SAP transformation programs with some of the biggest companies.
   

  

 Within our Nordic SAP community, we work with the newest SAP solutions and offerings such as SAP S/4 HANA Cloud, SAP CX, Ariba, SuccessFactors, SAP BTP and SAP RISE.
   

  

 We are now looking to expand our community at scale and are looking for candidates on several positions and seniority levels.
   

  

 To read more about our SAP Practice, visit us at https://www.accenture.com/us-en/services/sap-index
   

  

**SAP Data Nordic Value Tower:**
 Within the SAP Value Tower Data, we offer you the opportunity to work with SAP Data and to grow your knowledge within the area of Information Management, connected to SAP MDG, Master Data Management and Data Migration.
   

  

 We are looking for people who have a genuine interest in Data, want to grow and challenge themselves within that area and work with the best skilled colleagues.
   

  

**Role Overview:**
 As a junior SAP Data Consultant in Accenture’s Nordic SAP Business Group, you will be an integral part of our team supporting our clients SAP transformation projects through acting as a Functional Expert in the Data Migration and/or Data Governance areas. You will work closely with clients, translating their business and functional requirements into SAP design documents and overseeing solution delivery. Your strong business process knowledge, combined with your in-depth expertise will be key to designing effective and efficient solutions for our clients.
   

  

**Example project roles:**
- Advise clients on their data transformation strategies, driving value creation through the positioning of SAP enabled solutions as well as leading solutions from SAP partners and Accenture

- Be part of the data migration stream of an S/4HANA transformation, working with colleagues in delivery centers to execute on their data transformation and data upload strategies

- Work with clients on their transformational journey, by implementing Master Data Governance strategy and processes, following SAP best practices and Accenture’s proven ways of working

**What’s in it for you:**
- Help Accenture deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity

- Be part of our culture and core values in a truly human work environment

- Take part in our highly engaged and diverse global network, for collaboration and delivery

- Enjoy competitive compensation and benefits

- Develop your skills and build an extraordinary career

- Grab significant development and training opportunities to develop your business acumen, consulting toolbox, technical and professional skills

- Get internal coaching, support and guidance from a mentor, to progress in your work and professional career with continuous feedback

- Gain access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization, including implementation methodologies, knowledge databases, industry leading add-on software, expert networks and benchmarks

- Combine business consulting skills with technology strategy know-how

- Transform businesses with the newest technologies and making them data-driven companies

- Work with some of the biggest SAP clients in large global implementation projects

- Be an integral part of innovative SAP transformation projects

- Play a key role in transforming organizations and communities around the world.

**Qualifications**
**Must have:**
- Multiple years of hands-on experience with SAP Data Migration and/or Data Governance

- Multiple years of experience with team leadership and/or project management on S/4HANA or other SAP implementation or transformation projects

- Passion about SAP, innovation and delivery of the latest technologies to your clients

- Very good understanding of Master Data models, methods and standards

- Hands-on experience in working with SAP technologies within MDG, Data Quality, Data Management and/or Data Migration

- Experience of the full project lifecycle including estimating, planning and delivering a solution end-to-end

- Deep business & industry experience in one or more industries

- Strong resonance with Accenture’s values

- Motivation, persistence, eagerness to optimize and drive for excellence

- Strong analytical skills, result-oriented paired with highly structured working style and good sense of responsibility, flexibility and to be a team player

- Ability to effectively work with cross-functional teams/stakeholders in an international and fast-moving environment

- Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills to address technical and non-technical audiences in English

- A Bachelor or Master’s degree

**Very nice to have:**
- Nordic (Danish, Norwegian, Swedish or Finnish) language spoken

- An SAP certification in a relevant area

- Specific knowledge in a functional or business process area within SAP

- Deep skills in Data Transformation tools and activities

- Extensive experience with Data Quality and/or Data Cleansing tools and activities

 Locations
   

  

 Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö
   

  

 Thank you for your interest in joining Accenture. Due to the summer holiday season, our response times might be a bit longer than usual. Please note that we will review your application in the beginning of August and get back to you shortly after.

title: Finanskonsult Microsoft D365 - Tietoevry Tech Services (m/f/d)
description:
**You may apply to Tietoevry by selecting Apply and fill your application details to the form. You may also Apply by using LinkedIn and populate details to your application from your LinkedIn profile.**
 Är du en finanskonsult som har arbetat inom Microsoft D365-området och letat efter nya utmaningar? Då tror vi att vi kan vara din nästa arbetsgivare.
   

  

 Microsoft D365-teamet växer och vi söker en Finanskonsult inom Microsoft D365 som vill bli en del av Tietoevry Tech Services.
   

  

**När du börjar på Tietoevry Tech Services som Finanskonsult Microsoft D365 kommer du:**
* Jobba mot internationella kunder som är världsledande inom deras område
* Jobba nära våra kunder i en rådgivande roll och hjälpa dem att effektivisera sin verksamhet
* Tillsammans med ditt projektteam driva ny implementeringar och vidareutveckling av befintlig funktionalitet.
* Få stor frihet att jobba självständigt och flexibelt


**Vem vi letar efter**
* Du har en akademisk examen i ekonomi gärna kombinerat med IT, arbetat i några år och har en god förståelse för företagsflöden inom branschen.
* Du har ett intresse för att effektivisera företagsflöden och företag.
* Du är en lagspelare, nyfiken, social och serviceinriktad.
* Trivs att jobba i projekt
* Är väl bekant med redovisning, ekonomiska principer och ekonomiska processer.
* Har bred erfarenhet inom D365 F&O
* Har genomfört end-to-end implementationer inklusive analys, design, konfiguration, test, träning, cut-over och rapportering.
* Har arbetat med pre-sales, kravanalys eller estimering.
* Har god kommunikativ förmåga på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Vi erbjuder**
 Vi erbjuder dig professionell tillväxt, meningsfulla projekt, öppen kultur och en enastående balans mellan arbete och privatliv! Vi erbjuder dig en möjlighet att skapa framtiden för en snabbt växande och viktig sektor. Vi tror att vår organisationskultur är en viktig del för att du ska bli framgångsrik. Vi tillhandahåller en flexibel hybrid arbetsmodell som en del av vår kultur och vårt sätt att arbeta. Slutligen tror vi också på nyfikenhet och konstant lärande som en livsstil där du behöver skola om dig varje dag när nya möjligheter dyker upp.
   

  

**Blev du inspirerad?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Bifoga ditt CV eller LinkedIn-profil så kontaktar vi dig. Intervjuer kommer att hållas löpande, så vi uppmanar dig att söka redan idag.
   

  

 Hoppas vi hörs snart!
   

  

*Anställning hos oss kan innebära anställning inom en säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetskontroll med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför genomföras innan beslut om anställning fattas.*
*På Tietoevry tror vi på kraften av mångfald, jämlikhet och inkludering. Vi uppmuntrar sökande från alla bakgrunder, kön (m/k/d) och livsstilar att bli en del av vårt team, då vi tror att detta främjar en inspirerande arbetsmiljö och innovation. Vårt engagemang för öppenhet, förtroende och mångfald är kärnan i vår mission att skapa lösningar som gynnar företag, samhällen och mänskligheten i stort* 
*Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)*
*Vi utför bakgrundskontroller av alla slutkandidater.*
*Tietoevry tackar nej till samtal från rekryteringsföretag.*
**Om Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry skapar målmedveten teknik som återuppfinner världen för gott. Vi är ett ledande teknikföretag med ett starkt nordiskt arv och global kapacitet. Utifrån våra kärnvärderingar öppenhet, tillit och mångfald, arbetar vi med våra kunder för att utveckla digitala framtider där företag, samhällen och mänskligheten frodas.
   

  

 Våra 24 000 experter globalt är specialiserade på moln, data samt mjukvara och bistår tusentals företagskunder och offentliga kunder i mer än 90 länder. Tietoevrys årliga omsättning är cirka 3 miljarder euro och bolagets aktier är noterade på NASDAQ-börsen i Helsingfors och Stockholm samt på Oslo Børs. Bekanta dig med vad vi gör.
   

  

 Skapar målmedveten teknik för att återuppfinna världen för gott

title: Dynamics 365 CE Consultant
description:
At Avanade, we see how the power of Dynamics 365 shapes the future of businesses every day. By combining our unmatched Microsoft knowledge with our creative approach to innovation and strong industry knowledge, we create a lot of opportunities for Microsoft, our clients, and for you. Avanade has countless paths for you to pursue. One of them is sure to lead to your unique version of success.
   

  

**Come join us**
 As a Dynamics 365 CRM Consultant, you will be client-facing and responsible for the discovery, scoping, and collection of requirements to build and deploy solutions that are tailored to your customer. You will be a part of the Nordics CE (Customer Engagement) practice that consists of around 60 members in different roles as Solution Architects, Business Analysts, Developers, and Functional Consultants. We primarily work with Dynamics 365 and Power Platform and often collaborate with other practices, especially with Data & AI and Software Engineering. We have flexible work arrangements so you can work either from home or at Avanade's or our clients offices.
   

  

**Skills And Experiences**
* Experience working as a Technical CRM Consultant
* Hands-on experience with Dynamics 365 and Power Platform (e.g., Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI and Power Virtual Agents)
* Technical experience and/or ability to configure and customize Dynamics 365 modules (e.g., CE, Sales and/or Customer Service. Having Field Service experience is a plus)
* Experience working with no-code/low-code development
* Great interpersonal skills and experience in customer-facing roles
* Fluent in any Scandinavian language and English


**This Will Help You Stand Out**
* Programming skills and understanding of JavaScript, C# and the .NET-framework
* Relevant Dynamics 365 CE/CRM and/or Power Platform certifications
* Experience leading project teams on a day-to-day basis with expertise, guidance and mentorship
* Bachelor's or master's degree in the field of IT such as Computer Science, Information Systems, E-Business or similar


**About You**
 Characteristics that can spell success for this role
   

  

* Consultative, collaborative, relationship builder
* Resilient, adaptable, flexible
* Intellectually curious and passionate about tech
* Client-centric attitude
* Passion for learning and development


**What You'll Do**
* Consult and advise our clients and internal stakeholders on uses of technology to solve business problems
* Participate in client workshops to analyze and design solutions
* Collaborate with project teams in customizing, developing and extending Dynamics 365 CE and utilize the Power Platform to meet client needs
* Actively participating across all project phases (e.g., plan, analyze, design, build and test)
* Demonstrating a commitment to your professional development by actively obtaining relevant Power Platform (e.g., PL-200) and Dynamics CRM certifications
* Depending on your seniority, you may lead project teams with expertise and guidance


**Learn more**
 Interested to hear more? Apply today, we can't wait to hear from you!
   

  

**Enjoy your career**
 Some of the best things about working at Avanade
   

  

* Pathway to work on industry leading programs of work
* Opportunity to work with global customers
* A people-first culture that supports innovation to push teams in new directions
* Quickly turn your ideas to human impact by cultivating a team that will help clients unlock what’s next
* Real-time access to technical and skilled resources globally


**A great place to work**
 As you bring your skills and abilities to Avanade, you’ll get distinctive experiences, limitless learning, and ambitious growth in return. As we continue to build our diverse and inclusive culture, we become even more innovative and creative, helping us better serve our clients and our communities. You’ll join a community of smart, supportive collaborators to lift, mentor, and guide you, and to lean on your expertise. You get a company purpose-built for business-critical, leading-edge technology solutions, committed to improving the way humans work, interact, and live. It’s all here, so take a closer look!

title: Account Executive, Public Sector
description:
**Why You Should Apply**
* You will deliver objective, actionable insights to CIOs and their teams within Public Sector clients in Sweden.
* You will join a high-performing, global company that is seeing double-digit growth for 40+ consecutive quarters.
* You will work in a highly collaborative sales environment with excellent career growth opportunities – 95% of our leadership positions were hired internally.


**Position Summary**
 For our office in Solna, we’re looking for an Account Executive to partner with new and existing clients within Public Sector.
   

  

 As an experienced sales professional, you will address your clients’ most critical priorities. You will identify opportunities for account retention and growth through contract expansion, introducing new services and products. This is a field-based role, selling directly to Large Enterprise clients; organisations with $750M+ in annual revenue, which includes 77% of the Global F500.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Quota of approximately $1M in contract value across 5-10 large enterprise accounts.
* Build trust-based, value-added relationships with C-level executives and their teams, primarily the CIO and CIO office.
* Drive account retention and growth by impacting their most critical priorities and demonstrate Gartner’s value.
* Drive new business with new logos, through networking, events and your own prospecting.
* Utilise industry knowledge of your specific market segment, stay up to date with trends to ensure an effective go to market approach.
* Collaborate across teams, regions and departments, sharing best practice, to ensure a best-in-class approach to strategic initiatives and growth plans
* Support the business in improving diversity, developing fellow associates, and growing the team within an inclusive environment


**Requirements**
* 5+ years of relevant sales experience, of which at least 2 years in a tech/IT environment. Direct sales experience within a software vendor, system integrator, IT consultancy & services, or a similar environment is highly relevant for this role.
* Experience selling to senior leaders, preferably the CIO.
* A track record of consistent (over)achievement on your goals and targets.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree is desirable.
* Fluency in Swedish and English.
* Experience using Challenger Sales or a similar sales method is a plus.


**What Gartner Gives You**
* Uncapped earnings and challenging and achievable quotas – 85% of our salesforce hit quota, unlocking accelerators every year
* An all-expenses paid "Winners Circle" trip for top performers; every year, 40-50% of sales associates qualify for this
* Best-in-class training, including an intensive 2-week sales expedition for new hires and continuous support after that
* Growth opportunities: our business is seeing double-digit growth, providing plenty of internal career development opportunities.
* Excellent corporate benefits.
* Collaborative, team-oriented culture that embraces diversity, equity, and inclusion, to empower each associate to be their authentic and best self.
* Virtual first policy, giving the chance to combine working from office and home
* The opportunity to work with Global 500 and sell at C-level and work with some of the brightest minds in the industry and help them to build the successful organisations of tomorrow


**Who are we?**
 At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.
   

  

 Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective insight, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.
   

  

 Since our founding in 1979, we’ve grown to more than 20,000 associates globally who support ~15,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That’s why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.
   

  

**What makes Gartner a great place to work?**
 Our sustained success creates limitless opportunities for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. We have a vast, virtually untapped market potential ahead of us, providing you with an exciting trajectory long into the future. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.
   

  

 We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.
   

  

 Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.
   

  

 We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.
   

  

 In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive — working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.
   

  

 Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.
   

  

 The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to affirmatively seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.
   

  

 Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1 (203) 964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com.
   

  

 Job Requisition ID:88480
   

  

 By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.
   

  

 Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy

title: Director Analyst, AI Data Analytics for Leadership Expertise (Remote Europe)
description:
**Who you are:**
 Analyst will create Gartner research and analysis, communicate it to clients and support the sales force in new sales and client retention. The research provides insight, predictions and actionable advice to clients in the area of AI, Data Science and Analytics. This includes writing about, presenting and advising organizations about market trends, vendors, service providers, governance and best practices in business analytics.
   

  

**What you will do:**
* Conduct research and analysis in AI, Machine Learning, GenAI, Data Science and Analytics. Specific areas of focus will include those topics critical to Data and Analytics Leaders such as Best Practices, AI Ready data, Strategy, Technologies, Market trends and Vendors/Vendor solutions.
* Expertise in:
+ AI/ML MLOPS, model development, management and deployment including infrastructures (SW+HW)
+ Analytics and Data Science
+ Application development implications of AI
+ GenAI
+ AI vendors comparisons
+ Governance and Responsible AI

* Applicable experience in related industry discipline and deep knowledge of a particular market, industry or role; deep understanding of both technology and industry to include the market, vendors, products and user strategies in specific areas.
* Cover the specified areas as well as applicable adjacent areas, while maintaining a view across a broad spectrum of the market, to produce innovative, thought-leading, impactful, fact-based research.
* Identify critical questions facing Gartner clients and crafting appropriate research methods to address them. Provide in-depth analysis based on extensive client input, collaboration with other Gartner analysts and personal experience.
* Drive client demand for Gartner’s research.
* Lead a body of research and be recognized in the industry as a subject matter expert – develop a following.
* Create and deliver high value presentations and other materials.
* Assist the Sales organization in selling and retention on any topic covered by the Analyst's team.
* Provide high quality and timely research peer review. Provide mentorship and support team members.
* Actively participate in or lead research community meetings to discuss research issues and collaborate effectively with peers.


**What you will need:**
* 10+ years of experience within the technology field. Will previously have held a leadership role within technology or business field
* Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience
* Articulate and succinct communication skills; ability to understand and explain complex ideas effectively.
* Exceptional analytical skills: ability to apply conceptual models, recognizing patterns and drawing and defending conclusions.
* Strong project planning and management skills.
* Strong collaboration ethos, influencing and leadership skills.


**Who are we?**
 At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.
   

  

 Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective insight, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.
   

  

 Since our founding in 1979, we’ve grown to more than 20,000 associates globally who support ~15,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That’s why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.
   

  

**What makes Gartner a great place to work?**
 Our sustained success creates limitless opportunities for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. We have a vast, virtually untapped market potential ahead of us, providing you with an exciting trajectory long into the future. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.
   

  

 We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.
   

  

 Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.
   

  

 We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work.
   

  

**What do we offer?**
 Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.
   

  

 In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive — working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.
   

  

 Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.
   

  

 Gartner believes in fair and equitable pay. A reasonable estimate of the base salary range for this role is 130,000 USD - 165,000 USD. Please note that actual salaries may vary within the range, or be above or below the range, based on factors including, but not limited to, education, training, experience, professional achievement, business need, and location. In addition to base salary, employees will participate in either an annual bonus plan based on company and individual performance, or a role-based, uncapped sales incentive plan. Our talent acquisition team will provide the specific opportunity on our bonus or incentive programs to eligible candidates. We also offer market leading benefit programs including generous PTO, a 401k match up to $7,200 per year, the opportunity to purchase company stock at a discount, and more.
