Du kommer att tillhöra ett framgångsrikt globalt företag och arbeta tillsammans med inspirerande och engagerade medarbetare. Vi ser varje anställd som en viktig pusselbit i vår gemensamma framgång och arbetar aktivt med att skapa en utvecklande och trivsam arbetsmiljö genom ett personligt ledarskap. Framförallt har vi roligt tillsammans!
   

  

 Om du vill ha en roll med många sociala kontakter kombinerat med spännande teknik är det dig vi söker!
   

  

 För frågor om tjänsten, kontakta rekryterare maja.lindqvist@afry.com
   

  

**Roll:** 
 Embedded Software Developer |
 **Start:** 
 Omgående med hänsyn till uppsägningstid |
 **Placeringsort:** 
 Stockholm |
 **Lön:** 
 Efter överenskommelse
   

  

 På grund av stundande sommarledighet kan återkoppling gällande din ansökan komma att ske under augusti.
   

  

*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: Azurearkitekt
description:
*Redpill Linpro är ledande specialister inom open source och brinner för öppna lösningar, öppna affärsmodeller och ett öppet samhälle. Tillsammans samverkar vi för att uppnå maximal nytta för alla. Hos oss finns några av marknadens främsta experter inom sina specialområden. Vi är omkring 300 anställda och du finner oss i tre länder på sex kontor: Stockholm, Göteborg, Karlstad, Linköping samt i Köpenhamn och Oslo.*
**Vi är öppna – är du?**
 Är du redo att vara en del av framtidens molnlösningar? Vår verksamhet inom Azure Services växer, och vi söker nu efter fler underbara kollegor som brinner för att utveckla, designa och implementera systemlösningar i Azure!
   

  

 Som Azurearkitekt hos oss får du möjlighet att arbeta med både publika och privata molnlösningar där du kommer att ansvara för att utveckla lösningar på Azure-stacken. Arbetet kommer variera mellan olika plattformarna där integration kommer vara en återkommande del. På Redpill Linpro värdesätter vi samarbete och du kommer att arbeta nära andra kollegor för att göra en verklig skillnad för samhället, tillsammans med våra kunder.
   

  

 För att trivas i rollen känner du dig bekväm med att designa system som tar hänsyn till framtida förändringar. Du tänker proaktivt och har förståelse för att affärsprocesser ska tas hänsyn till innan du ger dig på tekniken. Vidare förstår du skillnaden mellan att jobba ”agilt” och att designa ett "agilt" system. Du vill lära dig nya saker och är bekväm med att ifrågasätta dina egna lösningar. Du frågar inte efter en färdig kravspecifikation men är villig att ta fram denna tillsammans med kunden.
   

  

**Som Azurearkitekt hos oss kommer du att arbeta med:**
* Ta fram krav tillsammans med kunden
* Identifiera ”core use-cases” utifrån framtagna krav
* Ta fram arkitektur på en konceptuell nivå och föreslå dens möjliga realiseringar
* Ta fram kostnadskalkyler och motivera val av tekniker
* Serverless teknologier
* Container lösningar
* Meddelandebaserade kommunikationsteknologier (ServiceBus, EventHub, etc)
* Diverse storage lösningar (SQL, Cosmos, Blob etc.)
* API design och livscykel
* DevOps
* C#, .NET, Typescript, Javascript eller Java


**Vem är du?**
 För att trivas som konsult hos oss är det viktigt att du har ett stort teknikintresse och en vilja att utveckla dig inom nya områden och ny teknik. Du drivs av problemlösning och delar värderingen att samarbete är det som tar oss framåt.
   

  

**Utöver detta ser vi att du uppfyller följande:**
* Har några års erfarenhet av utveckling, arkitektur eller liknande arbete
* Har goda kunskaper i både svenska och engelska
* Du har varit med/ansvarat för kommunikationen med affärssidan för att förstå vad det är för system man bygger och vem man bygger det för


**Meriter:**
* Du har gått kurser som ges av iDesign eller Barry O'Reilly på DF Kompetens.
* Du är certifierad arkitekt
* Du har tidigare suttit med konsultarbete eller tagit fram kravställning hos kunder


 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du vill arbeta med oss. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Redpill Linpro is the leading provider of Open Source services and products in the Nordics. We are located in Oslo, Stockholm, Gothenburg, Karlstad Linköping, Copenhagen, Aarhus, and Trondheim with a mission to share knowledge and best practices for a more open society.
   

  

 We are passionate about open solutions, open business models, and an open society where we work together for maximum benefit to everyone. We have got some really skilled co-workers here at Redpill Linpro, particularly within our main areas: API management, development, IT operations, data analytics, customer experience, cloud, DevOps, and automation.
   

  

**May the Source be with you!**

title: Läkare till videokonsultation
description:
**Var med och skapa framtidens digitala hälsotjänster!**

Som det första företaget i Norge lanserade Eyr videokonsultering via mobil år 2016, och sedan dess har vi levererat högkvalitativa och säkra digitala hälsotjänster till över 300 000 patienter i Sverige, Norge och Danmark. Vi ska nu utöka våra öppettider i Sverige och letar just nu efter fler kvalificerade läkare till vårt team som kan arbeta som konsult antingen i Sverige eller i Sverige samt i Danmark eller Norge. Hos Eyr värnar vi om att vården ska bli bättre och mer tillgänglig för alla. Vi har utvecklat en plattform som förenklar kommunikationen mellan patient och läkare både före, under och efter konsultationen. Att arbeta som läkare hos oss innebär banbrytande arbete både på teknisk och medicinsk nivå, där vi främjar innovation inom trygga ramar. Som konsult hos Eyr får du erfarenhet av framtidens e-hälsolösningar. Vi är ett växande företag och genom att ansluta dig nu har du möjlighet att påverka företagets framtid.

**Jobba när och var du vill**

Som konsultläkare med eget företag har du möjlighet att välja var du vill arbeta, hemifrån, på stugan eller till och med utomlands. På Eyr erbjuder vi konsultationer mellan 08.00-20.00 på vardagar och mellan 10.00-20.00 på helger och helgdagar.

Det förväntas att du kan arbeta några fasta pass under veckan, inklusive helg- eller kvällspass. Arbetet på Eyr är flexibelt och kan lätt kombineras med andra tjänster. Vi har skift av varierande längd mellan 2 och 8 timmar. Vi tillhandahåller ett cloud-based journalsystem. Det är alltid flera personer i tjänst samtidigt, så du kan alltid rådfråga kollegor oavsett om det gäller tekniska eller medicinska frågor.

**Lite om dig**

Du är entusiastisk inför att arbeta med digitala hälsotjänster och ser positivt på teknisk innovation inom hälsan. Du har professionell integritet, är trygg i din yrkesutövning och har god kommunikationsförmåga. Du är serviceinriktad, lösningsorienterad och strävar efter att ge patienterna en bra upplevelse.

Det är en möjlighet att kombinera dette arbete med ett annat jobb, och i vissa fall även inom arbetstiden.

Om du har erfarenhet inom allmänmedicin ser vi gärna att du hör av dig. Vi önskar att du har svensk läkarlegitimation samt minst två års erfarenhet från jourmottagning, akutmottagning eller primärvård. Det är en fördel om du även har dansk eller norsk läkarlegitimation och erfarenhet, samt att du behärskar antingen norska och svenska eller danska och svenska väl.

Var med och påverka framtidens sjukvård!

Jobbtyp: Deltid

Arbetstider:

* Dag
* Endast helgarbete
* Helgarbete förekommer
* Kväll
* Måndag till fredag
* Varje helg

Förmåner:

* Jobba hemifrån

Arbetsort: Distans

Förväntat startdatum: 2024-08-19

title: Senior Fullstackare till Cygnis kontor i Malmö
description:
*Är du kreativ, användarcentrerad, techig eller all-of–the-above? Då kanske du är vår nästa stjärna på Sveriges Bästa Arbetsplats?*



Vilka är vi?



Sedan starten 2006 har vi på Cygni haft visionen att vara den bästa arbetsgivaren för en skicklig och ambitiös IT-konsult, vilket är något vi lever efter dagligen. Våra konsulter är skickliga, vilket märks på alla våra nöjda kunder med sina spännande digitaliseringsprojekt. Vi är även den bästa arbetsgivaren, vilket bland annat bevisas i att vi sju år i rad vunnit utmärkelsen Great Place to Work (www.greatplacetowork.se)! Idag är vi cirka 250 medarbetare utspridda på våra sju kontor i Sverige och ett kontor i Danmark.



Utöver att våra konsulter styr över sin egen kompetensutveckling (vilket såklart görs på arbetstid), har de även stor påverkan på vilka typer av uppdrag och kunder som vi tar oss an. Därför anställer vi aldrig till ett befintligt uppdrag. Vi fokuserar istället på att hitta en person som kommer att trivas hos oss på vårt Malmökontor som i dag består av drygt 15 personer, och sedan matcha med rätt uppdrag för just den konsulten.



Vad innebär rollen som Senior Fullstackare?



Som senior fullstackkonsult på Cygni är du oftast navet ute hos kund. Din analytiska problemlösar-aura kommer vara mycket uppskattad bland dina teammedlemmar.



Vi ser gärna att du har några års arbetslivserfarenhet efter dina studier från något tekniskt universitet. Viktigast är dock att du är en relationsbyggande person som trivs i konsultrollen.



Vem är du?



Vi tror du har minst 4-5 års erfarenhet inom hela teknikstacken med alltifrån serverless, Cloud, REST, CI/CD, Java och/eller C# till frontnära JavaScript-programmering, och gärna då som konsult. Du har överlag ett starkt intresse för teknik och tycker det är kul att sprida din kunskap till andra.



Vad erbjuder vi?



Sedan 2021 är Cygni del av Accenture som med sina drygt 700 000 anställda gör att vi har ännu större bas av uppdrag, samarbeten och förmåner att hämta. Cygni verkar dock fortsatt som det lilla bolaget i det stora med egna event, kompetensutveckling och kultur. Detta gör att vi får det bästa av båda världar.



Exempel på förmåner som vi erbjuder:


Fast månadslön + vinstdelning
Bra föräldraförmåner (vid föräldraledighet och VAB)
Tjänstepension (premiebestämd på 4,5 %)
Sjukförsäkring
Tjänstegrupplivförsäkring ("TGL") samt trygghetsförsäkring vid arbetsskada ("TFA")
Fullt friskvårdsbidrag
Hostning av hobbyprojekt i molnet
Förmånscykel

Vi ser fram emot att få jobba med just dig! Tveka inte att höra av dig vid frågor till: Björn Dahlberg, Regionchef på Cygni i Malmö, bjorn.dahlberg@cygni.se eller Sabina Björkman, Konsultchef på Cygni i Malmö, sabina.bjorkman@cygni.se.


*Våra intervjuer sker på svenska, vi förutsätter därför att du behärskar det väl i både tal och skrift.*

title: Senior Fullstackare till vårt kontor i Östersund
description:
*Ta chansen att bli en del av Sveriges Bästa Arbetsplats! Vill du arbeta i spännande uppdrag, uppskattar modern teknik och möjligheten till att lära dig nya saker på arbetstid? Vi är ett gäng på 12 kollegor i Östersund och vi vill gärna bli ännu fler!*


Vilka är vi?


Sedan starten 2006 har vi på Cygni haft visionen att vara den bästa arbetsgivaren för en skicklig och ambitiös IT-konsult. I dagsläget är vi cirka 250 medarbetare utspridda på våra sju kontor i Sverige, ett kontor i Danmark och ett kontor i Finland. Sedan ett par år tillbaka är Cygni en del av Accenture vilket öppnar upp massor av framtida utvecklingsmöjligheter och samarbeten för dig som individ och oss som bolag. Vi är en del av en global organisation med ett nätverk i världsklass samtidigt som vi verkar på vår lokala marknad med vår spetskompetens inom IT.


Vårt mål är att en nyanställd ska känna det som att de fått drömjobbet. Vi har ett mysigt kontor centralt i Östersund, som också är en del av Gomorron Östersunds community. Flera av våra kunder har inte något kontor här i Jämtland, vilket gör att vi då arbetar remote. Några väljer att sitta hemma, och andra på kontoret. Eller lite av varje, det gör man som man vill! Ibland reser konsulterna till kunden för att få träffa teamet IRL.


Utöver att våra konsulter styr över sin egen kompetensutveckling (vilket såklart görs på arbetstid), har du som konsult även stor påverkan på vilka typer av uppdrag och kunder som vi tar oss an.


Vad innebär rollen som Senior Fullstackare hos oss?


Som senior fullstack-konsult på Cygni är du oftast navet ute hos kund. Du har möjlighet att arbeta över hela teknikstacken med alltifrån Serverless, Cloud, REST-tjänster, scripting och NoSQL-databaser till frontnära JavaScript-programmering.


Rollen är varierande och det ges ett stort utrymme att driva egna idéer, påverka och sätta dig in i dina kunders behov för att skapa bästa möjliga lösningar. Hos oss får du bidra och bemästra dina starkaste kompetenser, men även utforska och utveckla nya.


Vem är du?


Som senior fullstack-konsult på Cygni är du oftast navet ute hos kund. Du arbetar vanligtvis över hela teknikstacken med alltifrån frontend och användbarhet till backend och datalager. Ofta med molnet som driftmiljö antingen som serverless eller med hjälp av containers i ett kubernetskluster.


Några vanliga buzzwords som vi ser i våra projekt just nu är open source (såklart), Java, Kotlin, Typescript, C#, Node, Go. Docker, AWS, Azure, GCP, CD, React, React-Native, Flutter, Vue, Angular, microservices och microfrontends.


Vi tror att riktigt skarp systemutveckling skapas av människor som är glada, trygga och får utvecklas i sitt arbete. Hos oss strävar vi alltid efter att du ska få bidra och bemästra dina starkaste kompetenser, men även utforska och utveckla nya. Rollen är varierande och det ges ett stort utrymme att driva egna idéer, påverka och sätta dig in i dina kunders behov för att skapa bästa möjliga lösningar. Utöver att våra konsulter styr över sin egen kompetensutveckling (vilket såklart görs på arbetstid), har du som konsult även stor påverkan på vilka typer av uppdrag och kunder som vi tar oss an.


På de flesta av våra uppdrag så är det möjligt med hybrid eller remote- arbete.


Vad erbjuder vi?


Sedan 2021 är Cygni en del av Accenture som med sina drygt 700 000 anställda gör att vi har ännu större bas av uppdrag, samarbeten och förmåner att hämta. Cygni verkar dock fortsatt som det lilla bolaget i det stora med egna event, kompetensutveckling och kultur. Detta gör att vi får det bästa av båda världar!


Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten till individuell och betald kompetensutveckling på arbetstid och flexibla arbetsvillkor. Hos oss har du fast månadslön och vi månar om dina arbetstider. De få gånger arbetet kräver mer än 40 timmar har vi betald övertid. Vi erbjuder också ett riktigt vasst förmånspaket. Vad sägs om utfyllnad vid både föräldraledighet och VAB? Det är viktigt att livspusslet går ihop. Sjukförsäkring och sjukvårdsförsäkring ingår också i anställningen! Sen har vi naturligtvis de vanliga förmånerna också: friskvård, tjänstepension, förmånscykel och förmånsbil.


Vi ser fram emot att få jobba med just dig!


Låter det som du?


Ansök då , men innan dess så kan det vara bra att veta, att **intervjuerna sker på svenska** så vi förutsätter att du behärskar det väl i både tal och skrift.

title: Account Manager
description:
Are you a highly motivated professional passionate about sales and customer success? Avinode Group is looking for an Account Manager to manage existing accounts and drive revenue growth in your territory. In this role, you will work closely with our Customer Success Managers and Onboarding Specialists to deliver value and retain customers while exploring new business opportunities.


### **What you will do**


* **Understand Customer Needs**: Gain deep insights into your customers’ business drivers and challenges.
* **Strategic Advisor**: Build and maintain strategic advisor relationships with your customers across various departments to communicate and deliver value effectively.
* **Offer Solutions**: Proactively provide strategic insights and solutions to address customer challenges within the Charter Sales offering.
* **Identify Opportunities**: Expand the scope of Avinode Group’s products by identifying and further developing opportunities uncovered by Customer Success Managers.
* **Manage Leads**: Maintain a healthy sales pipeline, managing prospects to successful conversions.
* **Internal Communication**: Communicate customer needs and pain points internally, collaborating with the Product team to influence future product enhancements.
* Industry Engagement: Stay updated on industry trends by attending events, trade shows, and conferences.
* **CRM Management**: Consistently log activities and track sales opportunities in Avinode Group’s CRM system (Microsoft Dynamics).

### **What we are looking for**


We seek a seasoned sales and customer success professional with at least 3 years of experience in SaaS B2B sales. Any understanding of business aviation, specifically the charter sales operations of an operator/broker, will be a plus.  

You should be a people person with strong interpersonal skills and confidence in building relationships in person and over the phone. Your proven track record in developing and executing strategic account plans, negotiating contracts, and identifying new business opportunities will set you apart.  

We value individuals who are confident without being arrogant, hardworking yet fun, and passionate about delivering today while building for tomorrow. Embracing a dynamic and constantly changing industry, you should be highly motivated, entrepreneurial, and energetic, thriving in a high-performing organization.


* A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience is required
* Excellent problem-solving and negotiating skills and a strong analytical mindset are essential.
* You should be comfortable using data, member input, and team insights to inform your recommendations and assessments. A relentless pursuit of improvement, curiosity to experiment with new approaches and tools, and effective communication and influencing skills are also important.
* Willingness to travel internationally up to 25% of the time is required.


Join us at Avinode Group and be part of a team dedicated to delivering exceptional value to our customers while driving our business forward. Apply today and take the next step in your career!


### **What do we offer you?**


We are proud to offer you a workplace where we have high engagement and where creativity and curiosity are always much appreciated. Your ideas will be heard.


* Ability to schedule your calendar with flexible work locations.
* Competitive salary and benefits.
* Synergy events where all Noders across meet each other to collaborate on a professional level as well as have fun, which is equally important.
* Great opportunities to develop special skills or to learn new things with training. We want to support your development and dreams.

### **Want to join our crew?**


You’ll find more fun facts about our Noders (that’s what we call ourselves) and our culture on our website.


### **About Avinode Group**


Avinode Group, owned by CAMP Systems, offers a fully connected suite of essential B2B software to enable Business Aviation professionals through the entire workflow of managing, sourcing, and booking aircraft. Founded in the heart of Sweden in 2002, we support around 2,000 companies globally.


Our essential tools are designed to minimize stress and maximize profit for brokers and operators. The suite includes the world’s leading sourcing platform for air charter, making it easy to find aircraft, book trips, and market aircraft globally. Air charter operators and flight departments are provided with a fully cloud-based fleet management system to make flight operations smoother. Our customers can rely on a hassle-free process from quoting to booking and paying with a fully integrated payment solution.


With 150+ Noders spread between Sweden and the US, our flexible and collaborative culture empowers everyone to come forward with new ideas, try them out, make some mistakes, and initiate dialogue. Avinode Group seeks candidates who thrive on exciting assignments and can collaboratively work alongside other intelligent, humorous, and dedicated co-workers. Our roots are firmly planted in our core values, which inspire us daily to exceed expectations.


Avinode Group is an equal opportunity employer and cares about having the best people for the job. We care about your skills and who you are as a person.


Want more details? Discover the value our essentials bring to our customers every day.

title: Finance Controller Sweden
description:
**Empower, Connect, Evolve,** and **Inspire -** these are the values that drive us and make **BMI** a company where you can thrive and grow.

**Finance** **Controller Sweden**

**Are you interested in taking the next step in your career?**

**Passionate about helping us transform our organisation?**

**Are you open to working close to the business, hands on and with a strategic mindset?**

**This is an outstanding opportunity to help shape the future Nordic BMI business!**


BMI Sweden is part of BMI Group that delivers truly innovative roofing and waterproofing systems, designed to transform the way people live and work. The roof is not just a shelter. It can be a power centre, a living space, a vertical garden, even a work of art - most importantly - it can be part of our sustainable life.

**The Job:**


The Finance Controller is a crucial role responsible for ensuring the financial integrity and performance of the BMI Sweden entity. You will be responsible for the financial integrity of the BMI Sweden legal entities and you report to the Finance Director Sweden to ensure BMI Sweden's financial priorities are met.


The role will be responsible for providing financial insights and recommendations to Sweden Leadership Team and Senior Management and ensure compliance with all statutory and regulatory reporting requirements.


We believe you are based at our Swedish headquarters in Malmö.

**Your Main Tasks:**

* The role works closely with the FD Sweden, Country MD, Nordic Finance Director, Central finance, and GBS to lead end-to-end finance processes.
* Steering the finance functions through a period of rapid change ensuring it’s robust and efficient. Ensure efficient and effective delivery of the processes with robust control and compliance mechanisms .
* Responsibility for the delivery of financial accounting and controls, statutory reporting, technical accounting expertise and efficient financial operations.
* Oversee all company accounts.
* Ensure that all financial transactions are properly recorded, filed, and reported.
* Reducing the period close efforts and other task efficiencies.
* Report timely and accurate financial information, analysis, insights and present these to senior stakeholders.
* The point of contact for all technical accounting queries, auditors, tax advisors and relevant authorities.
* Adopt BMI Core process & technology standards and ensure proactive engagement in Finance Governance
* Oversee audits, including liaising with auditors and ensuring audit recommendations are addressed.
* Foster collaboration with and drive reporting to BMI’s shareholders
* Manage and oversee the preparation of the company’s financial statements to ensure they are accurate and timely

 **Your Experience:**

* University degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, or related field.
* Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in finance or accounting roles, preferably also having a professional financial qualification related to chartered accounting; accounting certification (e.g., ACCA, CIMA)
* Superior understanding of accounting principles and financial analysis, and even IFRS accounting principles .
* Excellent analytical skills and attention to detail.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams.
* Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities effectively.
* Demonstrated strong business acumen and understanding of financial principles.
* Proficiency in Excel or Sheet, particularly with handling large datasets.
* Ideally having experience in working with SAP / S4 Hana and SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC).
* Solid experience from stakeholder management in an international/Nordic environment.
* Proactive personality with a drive for continuous improvement and innovation.
* You are fluent in Swedish, and have very good skills in English.

 **We Offer:**

* Great development opportunities - You will have plenty of influence on how to develop both the job and the organisation.
* An informal work environment that values quality, competences and cooperation.
* Varying and challenging work tasks with a great degree of freedom.

**What you can expect:**
------------------------


We are designing and building a new organisation in order to become the leading product and service provider in its field of expertise. You become part of an exciting transformation process based on tradition, combining technical knowledge and strong brands with product and process innovation.


We also apply the flexibility of a hybrid work office.


You will find excellent long term career development opportunities, a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as a continuous learning and development culture in a dynamic international environment.

*For more information about us and the role please contact Ingvild Solheim Bobek, Talent Acquisition Manager Nordic, +46 733 667585. We apply a continuous selection and therefore welcome your application as soon as possible, however no later than August 12, 2024. Please apply by sending your CV in English.*

*A career with BMI Group is more than just a job. We help you to find work you enjoy, to use your skills, and support you to become the best you can be. Working together we can achieve great things. Come and join us.*

**BMI Group**


A roof is made up of more than its surface covering. It is the foundation to the community. BMI Group is privately owned and the largest manufacturer of flat and pitched roofing and waterproofing solutions throughout Europe with a significant presence in parts of Asia and Africa, headquartered in Reading/U.K.


Innovative systems and ideas are backed by decades of expertise. The company supplies complete systems to provide fully integrated solutions for any roofing project. With our roofing systems we can ensure a complete solution for every type of construction.They can help reduce air pollution, cut CO2 emissions and improve energy efficiency.


At BMI Group, we want to make a difference for our customers. We understand what value diverse staff brings, we enjoy it, we support it wherever we can and grow our teams to be diverse. For the benefit of our people, our clients and the community we live in. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and are an affirmative action employer.

*A career with* *BMI Group* *is more than just a job. We help you to find work you enjoy, to use your skills, and support you to become the best you can be.*

 *Working together we can achieve great things. Come and join us.*
company_description: BMI Group is part of the Standard Industries family of companies, which includes GAF, the leading manufacturer of roofing and waterproofing solutions in North America.

title: Marketing & Communications Communicator
description:
**Job ID:** R0008303


**Date posted:** 17/07/2024


**Company description** **Here it is!**  

Your opportunity to challenge yourself in one of our Marketing & Communication roles, right in the middle of the most influential small town in the world! We are now looking for a new colleague to join us as Marketing & Communication Communicator (MCC) in Range Area Consumer Packaged Goods. Come and join a business environment where we are working together, contributing, and making a difference! We have ambitious plans, an exciting range and a strong position in people and planet positive!

 **Job description** **As Range Area Marketing & Communication Communicator** (MCC) you are responsible for creating and securing high quality communication content for a specific product area within Consumer Packaged Goods, for all consumer facing touchpoints such as our IKEA stores and IKEA.com, with the ambition to turn IKEA visitors into customers. Maximizing the sales of Consumer-Packaged goods can be complex and challenging and here you as MCC play an important role for the IKEA customer and are responsible for crucial communication supporting our consumers in the buying journey. As MCC you use insights to identify and define communication needs and you create the right pre-conditions for customers to understand, compare and choose the right product. MCC is responsible for identifying the need of communication content presented on product information pages at IKEA.com e.g. films, images, product stories and texts for the product areas you are responsible for. You analyze, brief, order and approve communication content according to budget and time plan. You lead and work on operational assignment, contributing to Tactics and strategic assignment. The M&C Communicator is part of the Commercial function and reports to the Commercial Manager.

 **Qualification**  

In order to be successful in the role you need to have a strong knowledge and passion in the marketing and communication field as well as experience in brand and marketing management. You have a deep interest in product development and creating solutions for a better everyday life for the many people and you are passionate about making the IKEA vision come true in every product. You have excellent communication skills, passion for home furnishing and life at home and the ability to use communication as a strategic tool. You are a true ambassador of the IKEA culture and values and you are fluent in English, both spoken and written!


Experience of working in IKEA Retail – working with marketing and/or communication in a Service office or a background from marketing function in a retail landscape is welcome.

**Other things we feel are important;**

* You have an academic degree in Marketing, Media and Communication or equivalent.
* Experience from working within the field of digital communication, social media, SEO and customer behavior online is highly valued.
* You have experience from leading communication plans and its execution and delivering communication contents according to budget and time plan.
* You have knowledge about competitors, market trends and consumer behavior and you have an excellent ability to develop a strong and commercial customer meeting through communication and follow up on business impact.
* You are analytical, structured and have a holistic view, yet an eye on the details.
* You have a proactive attitude in problem solving and you are guided by simplicity and always strive to exceed expectations by delivering high quality communication
* You are an initiator and you have the ability to network cross functions and organizations.
* You enjoy working in a fast-paced environment and you have the ability to juggle competing priorities when receiving assignments with tight deadlines.
* It is an advantage if you have experience in Adobe Creative Cloud
* You are a true team-player.

  

**More Information** **Does this sound like your next challenge?** We look forward to receiving your application in English latest 10th August 2024.


If you have any questions regarding the position please contact Dennis Ninic Nilsson, Commercial Manager, dennis.ninic.nilsson1@inter.ikea.com
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Receptionist Downtown Camper by Scandic
description:
\*\*Välkommen till ett inspirerande livsstilshotell med en atmosfär som främjar gemenskap, kreativitet, nyfikenhet och upptäckarglädje!\*\* Downtown Camper erbjuder inte bara nattsömn och god mat och dryck, utan allt från yoga till upptäcktsfärder och inspirationsföreläsningar. Här står mötet i fokus – mötet mellan natur och storstad, och mellan stockholmare och inresande. Vi vill att hotellet ska vara ett självklart basecamp för äventyrslystna upptäckare. Vi som arbetar på Downtown Camper i dag tycker vi har en rolig arbetsplats, fantastiska kollegor, bra ledarskap och en härlig atmosfär. Så är du en social, naturälskande storstadsmänniska? Då kan du vara den vi söker.


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Downtown Camper by Scandic.**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Du agerar värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad är innebär rollen?**



Du som arbetar i receptionen är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i receptionen innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsten**



Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid.


Vi kommer tillsätta två tjänster varav en tillsvidare och en på visstidsanstälning fram till 4/1. Vi tillämpar provanställning.


Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------


Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_addresses:
Scandic Hotels Deutschland GmbH
Gabriele-Tergit-Promenade 19
10963 Berlin
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Engineering Manager - RAN
description:
As the technology firm that created the mobile world and a rich history of 145 years of building ground-breaking solutions and innovative technologies supported by 60,000+ patents, Ericsson has made it our business to make a mark. When joining our team at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you are welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.
Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions (BEWS) is the group responsible for leading Ericsson’s Enterprise Networking and Security business. Our growing product portfolio spans across wide area networks, local area networks and enterprise security. We are the #1 global market leader in Wireless-WAN based enterprise connectivity solutions and are growing fast in enterprise Private 5G networks and Secure Access Services Edge (SASE) solutions.
How Will You Contribute to the Company?
Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions is on a mission to become number #1 in the Private Cellular Networks space with the Ericsson Private 5G (EP5G) product offering.
The Ericsson Private 5G is a next-generation, private network, tailored to drive Industry 4.0, the modernization and digitalization of infrastructures and business process operations. Organizations gain secure and powerful 4G LTE and 5G Standalone (SA) connectivity allowing them to optimize and simplify business critical operations through data creation, collection, and analysis.
As an Engineering Manager for a team of senior RAN engineers and Software Developers, you will have the opportunity to experience a full end-to-end telecom network first-hand, including RAN, Cloud ENM, Core and our Cloud based management system, and to shape the future of our organization.
You are accountable for the team's day-to-day operations, playing a critical role in unlocking the full potential of your team. We also expect you to leverage on your past experience as a technical leader, as well as a people leader, to lead the team, coaching and supporting them to grow as professionals and individuals.
Are you the one we are looking for? If so, don't hesitate to apply or contact us!
What Will You Do?* Be accountable for the team's deliverables and commitments, playing a central role in leading and coordinating the team's day-to-day activities and unblocking impediments
* Align and collaborate with other R&D functions within the organization, but also with other Ericsson entities, such as BNEW and BCSS to secure short-term and long-term business objectives
* Coach individuals in the team to continuously learn and improve in everything they do
* Hire and retain the best talent in the market, both in the fields of RAN and SW Development/IT/Cloud, in order to build a strong team


Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications:* At minimum five (5) years of experience in combined technical and people leadership positions, with experience from leading cross-functional development teams and senior developers within the fields of Telco, IT and/or Cloud
* Excellent people management and coaching skills
* Excellent stakeholder management and negotiation skills
* Excellent communication skills
* Experience working in the Telco domain (e.g. Ericsson RAN products, ENM) and/or with public cloud (e.g. GCP or AWS)
* Fluency in using Jira, Confluence, Linux, git and other common R&D tools
* Bachelor's degree

title: Senior RAN Engineer
description:
As the technology firm that created the mobile world and a rich history of 145 years of building ground-breaking solutions and innovative technologies supported by 60,000+ patents, Ericsson has made it our business to make a mark. When joining our team at Ericsson you are empowered to learn, lead and perform at your best, shaping the future of technology. This is a place where you are welcomed as your own perfectly unique self, and celebrated for the skills, talent, and perspective you bring to the team.
Ericsson Enterprise Wireless Solutions (BEWS) is the group responsible for leading Ericsson’s Enterprise Networking and Security business. Our growing product portfolio spans across wide area networks, local area networks and enterprise security. We are the #1 global market leader in Wireless-WAN based enterprise connectivity solutions and are growing fast in enterprise Private 5G networks and Secure Access Services Edge (SASE) solutions.
How Will You Contribute to the Company?
Ericsson Enterprise Solutions is on a mission to become number #1 in the Private Cellular Networks space with the Ericsson Private 5G (EP5G) product offering.
The Ericsson Private 5G is a next-generation, private network, tailored to drive Industry 4.0, the modernization and digitalization of infrastructures and business process operations. Organizations gain secure and powerful 4G LTE and 5G Standalone (SA) connectivity allowing them to optimize and simplify business critical operations through data creation, collection, and analysis.
As a Senior RAN Engineer working with this product, you will have the opportunity to experience a full end-to-end telecom network first-hand, including RAN, Core and our Cloud based management system. There are many interesting technical challenges to tackle, so this product and organization is an excellent place for both newcomers and experts if one is willing to grow as a professional.
Are you the one we are looking for? If so, don't hesitate to apply or contact us!
What Will You Do?* Development of the Ericsson Private 5G RAN solution, including integration of new RAN products (4G/5G radios, baseband, R6K, etc)
* Systemization, configuration and optimization of the RAN solution for time critical (Enterprise) purposes
* Provide expert guidance on complex RAN related issues found during development or from Customers. This includes functional and non-functional behavior in industry 4.0 environments and use-cases
* Develop and automate the Life-cycle-management of the EP5G cENM solution
* Perform application-level changes in our various cENM cloud environments


Qualifications
Minimum Qualifications:* At minimum five (5) years of experience from the Telecommunications and/or Radio Access Networks domain(s)
* Deep knowledge and hands-on experience in at least one product in the Ericsson RAN portfolio (e.g. 4G/5G radios, baseband, Router 6K, etc)
* Experience in RAN verification, optimization and troubleshooting (RF, Control Plane, TCC/Latency, RAN HW/SW tools)
* Experience and skills from deployment automation and system integration work of Cloud based components
* Knowledge and experience within the Quality of Service (QoS) area of Radio networks
* Fluency in using Linux, git and other common R&D tools
* Development (Golang, jinja, python) experience
* Bachelor's degree

title: Account Manager to Avinode Group
description:
Are you a highly motivated professional with a passion for sales and customer success? Avinode Group is looking for an Account Manager to manage existing accounts and drive revenue growth in your territory. In this role, you will work closely with our Customer Success Managers and Onboarding Specialists to deliver value and retain customers, while also exploring new business opportunities.

##### **What you will do**

* **Understand Customer Needs**: Gain deep insights into your customers' business drivers and challenges.
* **Strategic Advisor**: Build and maintain strategic advisor relationships with your customers across various departments to communicate and deliver value effectively.
* **Offer Solutions**: Proactively provide strategic insights and solutions to address customer challenges within the Charter Sales offering.
* **Identify Opportunities**: Expand the scope of Avinode Group’s products by identifying and further developing opportunities uncovered by Customer Success Managers.
* **Manage Leads**: Maintain a healthy sales pipeline, managing prospects to successful conversions.
* **Internal Communication**: Communicate customer needs and pain points internally, collaborating with the Product team to influence future product enhancements.
* **Industry Engagement**: Stay updated on industry trends by attending events, trade shows, and conferences.
* **CRM Management**: Consistently log activities and track sales opportunities in Avinode Group’s CRM system (Microsoft Dynamics).

##### **What We Are Looking For:**


We are seeking a seasoned sales and customer success professional with at least 3 years of experience in SaaS B2B sales. Any understanding of business aviation and specifically the charter sales operations of an operator / broker will be a plus


You should be a people person with strong interpersonal skills, confident in building relationships both in person and over the phone. Your proven track record in developing and executing strategic account plans, negotiating contracts, and identifying new business opportunities will set you apart.


We value individuals who are confident without being arrogant, hardworking yet fun, and passionate about delivering today while building for tomorrow. Embracing a dynamic and constantly changing industry, you should be highly motivated, entrepreneurial, and energetic, thriving in a high-performing organization.

* A Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience is required
* Excellent problem-solving and negotiating skills, along with a strong analytical mindset, are essential.
* You should be comfortable using data, member input, and team insights to inform your recommendations and assessments. A relentless pursuit of improvement, curiosity to experiment with new approaches and tools, and effective communication and influencing skills are also important.
* Willingness to travel internationally up to 25% of the time is required.

##### **What do Avinode Group offer you?**


We are proud to offer you a workplace where we have high engagement and where creativity and curiosity is always much appreciated. Your ideas will be heard.

* Ability to schedule your calendar with flexible work locations.
* Competitive salary and benefits
* Synergy events where all Noders across meet each other to collaborate on a professional level as well as having fun which is equally as important.
* Great opportunities to develop certain skill or to learn new things with trainings. We want to support your development and dreams.

##### **About Avinode Group**


Avinode Group, owned by CAMP, offers a fully connected suite of essential B2B software to enable Business Aviation professionals through the entire workflow of managing, sourcing, and booking aircraft. Founded in the heart of Sweden in 2002, we support around 2,000 companies globally.


Our essential tools are designed to minimize stress and maximize profit for brokers and operators. The suite includes the world’s leading sourcing platform for air charter, making it easy to find aircraft, book trips, and market aircraft globally. Air charter operators and flight departments are provided with a fully cloud-based fleet management system to make flight operations smoother. Our customers can rely on a hassle-free process from quoting to booking and paying with a fully integrated payment solution.


With 150+ Noders spread between Sweden and the US, our flexible and collaborative culture empowers everyone to come forward with new ideas, try them out, make some mistakes, and initiate dialogue. Avinode Group seeks candidates who thrive on exciting assignments and can collaboratively work alongside other intelligent, humorous, and dedicated co-workers. Our roots are firmly planted in our core values, which inspire us daily to exceed expectations.


Avinode Group is an equal opportunity employer and cares about having the best people for the job. We care about your skills and who you are as a person.


Find more fun facts about our Noders (that’s what we call ourselves) and our culture on our website.


##### **Want to join the Avinode group crew?**


In this process Avinode group collaborates with A-hub, if you have any questions about the process please contact Filippa Stenberg, filippa.stenberg@a-hub.se.

  

Kindly apply for this position with your CV and cover letter in English.

title: Teknikspecialist Windows Infrastruktur
description:
**Teknikspecialist Windows Infrastruktur på Advania**
-----------------------------------------------------

I rollen som Teknikspecialist Windows Infrastruktur inom affärsområde Managed Services Provider (MSP) arbetar du gentemot både befintliga och nya kunder i Windows-miljöer placerade i traditionella datacenter och i publika molnplattformar.


Du är en central del i vårt Transition & Transformationteam, som består av ca 20 personer med blandade kompetenser inom server och infrastruktur, nätverk, IT-arbetsplats samt projektledning. Teamet arbetar huvudsakligen med att etablera nya kunder in i Advanias tjänsteleverans samt genomföra förändringsprojekt för befintliga kunder. Våra kunder är av varierande storlek och finns inom både offentlig och privat sektor.


I våra etableringsprojekt implementerar vi ändamålsenliga och moderna tjänster och lägger grunden för en stabil drift och förvaltning. Vi är ofta bland de första som våra kunder möter av Advania så vad vi gör och hur vi gör det spelar stor roll för att skapa förtroende och en god och långsiktig kundrelation. Vi drivs av viljan att göra ett bra jobb och Advanias målsättning om att aldrig tappa en kund. Som teknikspecialist har du en mycket viktig roll i arbetet med att forma en modern och ändamålsenlig systemmiljö i nära samarbete med kollegor och kund.


Din roll innefattar bl.a. att delta i:

* Etableringsprojekt i syfte att onboarda nya kunder i Advanias tjänsteleverans
* Förändringsprojekt av olika slag för befintliga kunder
* Framtagning av lösningar som effektiviserar vår drift av kundernas miljöer
* Standardisering, effektivisering och automatisering av arbetssätt och system

**Vad vi söker hos dig**
------------------------

Som person är du kommunikativ och är intresserad av att möta och samarbeta med olika typer av människor, såväl internt som externt. Du trivs med att ta stort eget ansvar för att driva aktiviteter från start till mål. Du är nyfiken och inte rädd för att komma med nya idéer och förbättringsförslag.


Teknikmässigt har du kompetens, erfarenhet och förmodligen också certifieringar inom flera av följande områden:

* Microsoft Windows Server 2012-2022
	+ Active Directory, GPO
	+ DNS, både intern och extern
	+ Radius (Network Policy Server)
	+ AD Certificate Services samt NDES/SCEP/PKCS
	+ Multifaktortjänster (t.ex. Azure, Entrust, MidEye)
	+ Entra ID Connect
* PowerShell och scripting
* Microsoft Entra/Conditional Access
* Azure Enterprise Applications, SAML SSO


Utöver tidigare nämnda teknologier finns möjligheten att få arbeta med VMware, Cloud CPS Managering, AVD, Intune, MS 365, Linux, ADFS CCR, Azure S2S VPN och Azure vNet Peering.

**Vad vi erbjuder dig**
-----------------------

För oss är de viktigt att du upplever att du är en del av ett framåtlutat bolag där dina idéer är viktiga för vår fortsatta utveckling. Vi vill att du ska få utvecklas såväl brett som djupt inom ditt område. Du har varje dag möjligheten att lära av och dela med dig till kompetenta och engagerade kollegor i tvärfunktionella och virtuella team. Självklart erbjuder vi också möjlighet till fler certifieringar. Ditt team är geografiskt placerat i Solna i nyrenoverade och trevliga lokaler i direkt anslutning till pendeltåg och bussar. I Stockholm har vi också kontor i Liljeholmen.

  


### **Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**

Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.


Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut.

  

Välkommen att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.
company_description: Advania är ett techbolag som utformar skräddarsydda lösningar och skapar hållbara värden genom smart användning av teknik.

title: Vendor Alliance Manager
description:
Insight Enterprises is a Fortune 500 Solutions Integrator helping organizations accelerate transformation by unlocking the power of people and technology. With a 35-year foundation in hardware and software supply chain augmenting our deep expertise in cloud, data, AI, cybersecurity, and intelligent edge, we guide organizations through complex digital decisions to achieve extraordinary results.

  

We are looking for a Vendor Alliance Manger to work in our Sales Strategic Alliance function of the business based in Stockholm, Sweden.

  

You will be responsible for effectively managing vendor relationships, it is important to establish clear communication channels, set expectations and goals, and regularly review performance metrics to ensure mutual success. It is also important to understand the vendor's business model, product offerings, and market position to identify areas for collaboration and growth opportunities.

  

To develop accurate plans and forecasts, it is essential to have a deep understanding of the vendor's product roadmap, market trends, and customer needs. This can be achieved through regular meetings, market research, and collaboration with internal teams such as sales, marketing, and product management.

  

Overall, successful vendor management requires a collaborative and strategic approach, with a focus on building long-term relationships based on mutual trust and value creation.

  

So, if this is of interest to you then we would be keen to hear from you!

  

\*\*\*This role we are offering is a hybrid position, which will require you to work both remotely and in our Stockholm office. You will be expected to come into the office two times a week as part of your responsibilities. \*\*\*

 **As a Vendor Alliance Manger your Responsibilities are:**

  

* Manage strategic business relationships across vendor accounts and encourage the cross collaboration of key stakeholders in Sales and Marketing to ensure alignment with vendor growth objectives.
* Lead the in-country yearly business plan process: collect input and leverage from the global alliance team framework and align with key local stakeholders, agree on key growth initiatives, investments, MDF, execution milestones, and success metrics (business scorecard metrics).
* Own the execution of the business plan against defined milestone and metrics, drive landing by engaging with the local Sales & Marketing organisation to secure readiness, go-to-market offerings, on time launch of the campaigns, and sales execution. Drive the monthly and quarterly performance assessment within Insight and with the vendor and lead necessary cause corrections/actions.
* Establish Pan-EMEA executive engagement to drive key growth plans across the region and partner with local subsidiary alliance managers to drive successful execution in-country.
* Accountable for achievement against revenue and profit-based targets, building and maintaining accurate weekly reporting of the pipeline, forecast, and activities, to deliver against future revenue and GP targets.
* Responsible for translating and cascading departmental goals to the team, and for ensuring and nurturing a sense of ownership and alignment to the departmental strategy.
* Use vendor global funds to drive special investment initiatives for Insight.

  



**Experience and Skills:**

  

* Proven consultative and sales experience, demonstrates considerable experience within technology (services or software) and can provide evidence of prior success and consistent overachievement against targets.
* Fully conversant with Microsoft Office suite (Outlook, Excel, and Word).
* Demonstrable experience of managing and motivating a high performing team within a fast-paced, target driven environment.
* A team-player who can work successfully within a diverse team in a mutually supportive way (including with technical and sales teammates in multiple/virtual locations).
* Proven record of successful Partner Account/Partner Alliance relationship management.
* Extensive client facing sales experience, ability to win client confidence, and deliver client demonstrations with professional authority and ease.
* Demonstrable knowledge of modern business processes and trends and the impact of leading-edge IT solutions.
* A desire to learn more, develop professionally, and stay up to date with new technologies and advancements.
* In-depth knowledge of the vendor product strategy and product offerings.
* Microsoft experience is essential.

  



**About Insight:**

  

We believe that by giving you the freedom to think big and empower you to reach your full potential, together we will achieve the best outcomes. Along with excellent benefits and a compelling reward package, we offer the opportunity to work in a supportive environment with a high level of autonomy and creativity - there’s a reason our average employee tenure is over 6 years.

  

We strive to display our three core values of Hunger, Heart, and Harmony every day. They represent and drive who we are here at Insight and by doing so we are doing amazing things. Insight started in a garage in 1988 and it is through harnessing our three core values that two brothers, Eric and Tim Crown, steered Insight to the Fortune 500 company it is today. We are now a Global IT Services and Solutions business, enthusiastic about helping customers and the real people who sit behind them.

 **Application Details:**

  

Insight is an equal opportunity employer, and we are committed to achieving diversity and equality within our organisation. We seek out people from diverse backgrounds and encourage you to apply.

  

We will endeavour to contact you within five business days, should we feel your profile is a good match for this role. If you do not hear from us within this time, please presume that on this occasion, your application was not successful.

 *A full job description will be provided upon application.*

  

#LI-ED1

title: Cyber Security Architect
description:
**Job Description**
 Do you have a curious and analytical mindset and get inspired from being part of building a new world class cyber security organization? Then H&M Group can offer you a position that matches your personality! We are looking for Cyber Security Architect to join our organization based in Stockholm.
   

  

**Responsibilities** 
 :
   

  

* Contextualize corporate strategic vision, conducting analysis, identifying opportunities, and defining strategic activities in the Cyber Security domain.
* Analyze, design, develop, and maintain roadmaps and implementation plans to enable future-state security capabilities, ensuring organizational resilience, stability, and operational excellence.
* Drive continuous improvement and simplification to enhance end-to-end business value, collaborating across the organization to lower the total cost of ownership.
* Develop control mechanisms to manage Cyber risks in alignment with business risk appetite.


**Architecture Enablement** 
 :
   

  

* Develop conceptual and logical architecture designs, creating artifacts such as security principles, guardrails, capability models, and future state blueprints.
* Facilitate the delivery of targeted business outcomes, including drafting and proposing Architecture Decision Records, anchoring and ratifying Architecture Decisions, and monitoring their adoption and effectiveness.
* Maintain a registry of security solutions relevant to the domain, ensuring security capability maturity and managing the lifecycle of Architecture Decision Records.


**Change Enablement** 
 :
   

  

* Identify interdependencies and employ holistic thinking to design and implement solutions, considering cross-team perspectives.
* Act as a facilitator for complex technical topics, collaborating across functions to ensure comprehensive consultation.
* Communicate security best practices to embed security into platforms and products, sharing knowledge with the engineering and delivery community.


**Qualifications**
 What you need to succeed:
   

  

* Mastery of multiple security areas with deeper expertise in one or more of the following: Device security, Application security, Data security, Cloud security, Network security, Secure development, and IAM.
* Demonstrated skills and experience in information security within an international and diverse context.
* Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively within a non-hierarchical culture of


**Additional Information**
**Working with tech at H&M Group**
 Shaping the future of fashion with people, data, and tech. The fashion and retail industries are going through a transformation, driven by customers' technology and sustainability expectations. At H&M Group, we want to shape the future of fashion and lifestyle by harnessing the power of smart tech and data. With our 74-year history of innovation, we understand the need to collaborate and co-create with engineers and tech specialists around the world to achieve our vision.
   

  

**What we offer!**
 You are joining a unique value-driven culture, a large tech network and community where you can be yourself. Besides the obvious perks such as staff discount card, flexible work life, learning communities, wellness benefits, parental benefits etc. There are endless opportunities to experiment and grow in any direction that you want, and when you grow, we grow. Being a major player gives us countless opportunities to make a real impact and shape the future.
   

  

 This is a full-time position with placement in Stockholm

title: Consultant - McKinsey Digital
description:
**Who You'll Work With**
 You’ll be based in one of our Nordic offices as part of McKinsey Digital practice. This group brings together the best of McKinsey’s digital capabilities to help our clients use digital technology to transform their businesses.
   

  

 As part of this global team, you’ll be working on everything from IT modernization and digital strategy to agile, cloud, advanced analytics and digital business building. You’ll typically work on projects across all industries and functions and will be fully integrated with the rest of our global firm. You’ll also work with colleagues from across McKinsey & Company to help our clients deliver breakthrough products, experiences, and businesses, both on technology and non-technology topics.
   

  

 Our office culture is casual, fun and social with an emphasis on education and innovation. We have the freedom to try new ideas, experiment and are expected to be constantly learning and growing. There is also a strong emphasis on mentoring others in the group, enabling them to grow and learn.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
 You will work with C-suite executives, problem-solve on their key issues and provide actionable recommendations leveraging your technology know-how and business sense.
   

  

 You will play an active role in all aspects of a client project, typically working in teams of 3 to 5 consultants alongside experts and partners of all tenures including developers, designers, data engineers, agile coaches and others. This includes gathering and analyzing information, formulating and testing hypotheses, and developing and communicating recommendations. You’ll also have the opportunity to present results to client management and implement recommendations in collaboration with client team members.
   

  

 You will receive exceptional training as well as frequent coaching and mentoring from colleagues on your teams. This support includes a partner from your local office assigned to help you guide your career as well as several weeks of formal training. Additionally, you'll receive guidance and support from your local office or practice in the selection of client projects, helping you to develop your skills and build your network.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Master’s degree and at least one degree in a technical subject such as computer science, engineering or mathematics; advanced degree or MBA is a plus
* 2+ years of post-university experience in technology- and strategy-related roles in a professional services, blue-chip, industry or start up environment
* Outstanding records of academic and managerial or professional achievement
* Combination of strong strategic and analytical abilities with a passion for technology
* Proven track record of leadership in a work setting and/or through extracurricular activities
* Ability to communicate complex ideas effectively - both verbally and in writing - in English; fluency in the local language is an advantage
* Willingness to travel

title: Solution Specialist & Architect
description:
We continuously seek more Solution Specialists and Architects with high social skills and an entrepreneurial mindset who want to develop alongside us on our ongoing growth journey.
   

  

 This job listing is open-ended, and recruitment for the position occurs on a periodic basis.
   

  

**Planacy is looking for you – a skilful solution specialist!**
 We are a highly ambitious SaaS company that’s in an exciting phase of expansion. We have developed a powerful platform and, with it, taken the position as the leading platform for data-driven budgeting, forecasting and planning on the Swedish market. Our software both simplifies and streamlines more value-creating processes which contributes to better-planned and more successful companies.
   

  

 With near 200 customers, including Trustly, Rejlers, Billogram, Foodora, Fjällräven and Vitamin Well, we have demonstrated the value that our product can deliver. Now it's time to scale up!
   

  

 Sweden is our home turf, Scandinavia our market – but a category leading position in north of Europe is our goal. Now we are searching for you who, together with a motivated, competent and committed team, wants to be part of the journey to realise our vision: to contribute to more data-driven, better-planned and more successful companies as the ultimate ally for the modern FP&A.
   

  

**The specialist with passion**
**Who are you?**
 You probably have a couple of years’ of experience from a background as a consultant within ERP, business intelligence, performance management, or finance reporting. You’re an inquisitive problem solver who has a passion for working with customers and delivering well thought out technical solutions. At the same time, you are curious, like to take initiative and want to be part of an entrepreneurial team. At Planacy, you’ll have great opportunities to develop both your technical knowledge and knowledge within performance management, while your curiosity and interest in problem solving are given plenty of scope.
   

  

**About The Role**
 At Planacy, you’ll work with a leading product. You’ll be the specialist who, together with your team, helps our customers to design optimal budgeting and forecasting processes, and who helps them to obtain as much value as possible from the platform. The role is very social and your technical interests will play an important part. As part of our Customer Team, you’ll have a significant role as the technical specialist who ensures that what we deliver is of the highest quality with a great customer satisfaction. With the insights you gather, and in close dialogue with our product development team, you’ll also have the opportunity to influence the development of the product going forward.
   

  

 As part of the team, it’s mainly your passion, self-leadership and motivation that influence your development. You’ll gradually gain in-depth knowledge of our platform and data-driven financial management. You’ll also have great opportunities to grow alongside the company on its exciting growth-journey.
   

  

**You're**
* A problem solver
* A team player with good self-leadership skills
* Probably a background as a techy consultant
* Structured and thorough with a business mindset
* Communicative and educational


**Background/Skills**
* Degree in Engineering, Information Technology, Business, or a related field
* Previous experience of client-oriented roles
* Fluent in written and spoken English & Swedish


**We offer a flexible work environment and good employment conditions**
 At Planacy, all employees play a key role and have a significant impact on the product and the company’s development. We have a passion for what we do. We have fun together and celebrate our success with shuffleboard, bubbles, burgers and a well-stocked beer fridge – as well as with a week-long annual Take Off to a pleasant destination (usually in southern Europe).
   

  

 We are convinced that if the team - that makes our success possible - continuously evolves and are happy and healthy, the success will be all the greater. We therefore offer a high level of trust and we value commitment and a high level of responsibility.
   

  

**We also offer:**
* Flexible work environment 🕐
* Both fixed and variable salary 💰
* 6 weeks of vacation 🏄🏻‍♀️
* A very good retirement plan 👵🏼
* Comprehensive health insurance 💙
* Annually one week team Take Off 🏖 🕺
* + additional benefits


 The role is based at our brand new office in central Stockholm but we offer a lot of freedom under responsibility – we love the atmosphere in our office but part-time remote work is possible.
   

  

 Of course you should join Team Planacy's continued growth-journey as our next Solution Specialist!

title: Client Director
description:
**About the job** 




  





 Learnster is a cutting-edge learning management system committed to revolutionizing how organizations approach employee development. Our human-centered approach blends innovative technology and AI with a dedication to empowering individuals and fostering learning cultures. Learnster comprises 45 engaged individuals, 200+ customers, and users across 30+ countries. Join us on our trailblazing journey to reshape the future of workplace individual learning!
 



  





**Job description** 




  





 As a Client Director you will play a crucial role in expanding the company's client base and driving significant revenue growth. You will also maintain and enhance relationships with existing key accounts, ensuring their continued satisfaction and exploring opportunities for account expansion. We expect you to be a self starter, with a strong drive and interest in client interactions. The role requires a strategic approach to identify and engage potential clients, understand their needs, and develop tailored solutions that align with their business objectives. You are expected to take responsibility for, and ownership of, an annual sales quota of approx. 5M SEK in net new revenue.
 



  





**Your role will mainly include** 




  




* Prospecting: Identify and cultivate relationships with potential clients, understanding their needs and business challenges.
* Sales and Revenue Generation: Lead the sales process from prospecting to closing, focusing on creating new revenue opportunities.
* Client Relationship Management: Maintain strong relationships with existing clients, ensuring satisfaction and exploring opportunities for account growth.
* Negotiate agreements of own deals: Negotiate and sign contracts with customers and secure hand over to Customer Success.
* Keep records of own sales fulfilment and data reporting: To continuously work and keep the CRM system updated at company, contact and deal level. Also work efficiently with templates, sequences and reporting.



  





**To thrive in this role you have…** 




  





**Educational Background** 




  




* A Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Sales, or a related field or relevant experience.



  





**Professional Experience** 




  




* Minimum of 5-7 years of experience in a sales, business development, or account management role, with a proven track record in new client acquisition and revenue generation.
* Experience in managing and growing key accounts, with a focus on both client retention and expansion.
* Demonstrated success in negotiating and closing deals, preferably in a similar industry or market. Preferably SaaS B2B in HR Tech.



  





**What We Offer** 




  




* An exciting journey in a scale-up with strong investors
* Flexible work arrangements (remote/on-site)
* Health and wellness benefits
* Continuous learning opportunities within a vibrant, innovative team
* Six weeks of paid vacation plus 3 extra free days per year
* A culture that values diversity and promotes personal development



  





**We look forward to meeting you!** 




  




* Join a fast-growing and awarded SaaS company, where you will play a key role in shaping Learnster’s future.
* At Learnster, you will work with passionate and ambitious colleagues, ready to take ourselves, our team, and the company to the next level!

 Developer

title: Senior Datacenter Consultant
description:
This role has been designed as ‘’Onsite’ with an expectation that you will primarily work from an HPE partner/customer office.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know diverse backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.
   

  

**Job Description**
 HPE is seeking a Senior Datacenter Consultant
 **with Project Management skills.**
 On this role, you will need to have an excellent understanding of datacenter infrastructure and the ability to work in an Agile environment collaborating with Sales, Architects, Partners and the customers’ Developers, Testers, and Analysts. You will get to work in a collaborative environment that values your insight, encourages you to take on new responsibilities, promotes continuous learning, and rewards innovation.
   

  

 This role requires strong leadership and organizational skills, as well as working knowledge of datacenter hardware and software. You will also contribute in delivery of the technical activities in the projects.
   

  

**Day-to-day Responsibilities**
* Plan, coordinate, and oversee the implementation of infrastructure projects
* Develop project plans and timelines
* Take ownership of the customer engagements and manage small teams of engineers
* Identify and manage project risks
* Monitor progress of projects and report on results
* Ensure projects are completed in accordance with quality standards
* Interact with both internal and external stakeholders during all project phases
* Be mindful of customer needs and clearly communicate complex information
* Ensure projects are completed in accordance with quality standards


**Qualifications**
* Good project management and leadership skills
* Ability to manage smaller projects from inception to completion
* Good knowledge of datacenter IT infrastructure.
* Understand current technologies and trends related to Linux-based computing and private/hybrid cloud.
* Experience working in large, complex, enterprise datacenter environments
* Expertise in data migration methods
* Expertise in Virtualization technologies such as KVM, VMWare ESXi.
* Hands on experience of IT infrastructure such as storage, compute, and network
* Hands on experience of VMware based platforms and technologies
* Hands on experience of Linux-based platforms and technologies
* Strong foundational knowledge of networking models and technologies including Ethernet, IP, VLANs, routing, bridging
* Self-motivated with the ability to work independently
* Native in Swedish and fluent in English languages (in writing and speaking) are a must for this position.


**Desired Skills & Experience which will be considered a plus:**
* Working Experience with HPE datacenter infrastructure products (compute, storage)
* VMware Certified Professional (VCP) Certification
* Red Hat Certified Engineer (RHCE) certification
* Red Hat Certified Specialist (RHCS) in OpenShift Administration certification
* Red Hat Certified Architect (RHCA) certification
* Experience in HPC and AI/ML related technology
* Experience in Cloud Platforms such as AWS, Azure, and GCP


**Additional Skills**
 Accountability, Accountability, Active Learning, Active Listening, Bias, Business Growth, Client Expectations Management, Coaching, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Cross-Functional Teamwork, Customer Centric Solutions, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Design Thinking, Empathy, Follow-Through, Growth Mindset, Information Technology (IT) Infrastructure, Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Intellectual Curiosity, Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity, Process Improvements, Product Services, Relationship Building {+ 5 more}
   

  

**What We Can Offer You**
**Health & Wellbeing**
 We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.
   

  

**Personal & Professional Development**
 We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.
   

  

**Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging**
 We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know diverse backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.
   

  

**Let's Stay Connected**
